Dormitories with 8 single beds, anti-mite orthopedic mattress, air conditioning at 25 ° C without time restriction, locker. Towel and body soap.

Filter and water ozonizer for free consumption, free coffee station, free pass printing.

We have designed free experiences of exclusive flavors for our guests:
- Pairing chocolate and rum tobacco. A great sensory experience with this American trilogy, the spices of tobacco, the bitterness of chocolate and the sweetness of rum.
- Tasting of Pre-Columbian flavors, a tour with the indigenous ancestors around manioc or cassava from their preparations to the sweets accompanied by cold coffee.
- And you can not miss, a tasting of the endemic fruits: suckers, gooseberries, guama, papaya, mamey.

content.value:
The hostel is situated in a 400 year old house which is located in Getsemani, Cartagena, a few blocks away from Plaza de la Trinidad, Getsemani's main meet-up place. We are also easy walking distance to all of the centro historic sites. Our dorms are spacious, clean and each has its own bathroom. We also have additional enclosed showers and bathrooms. Also, we have a cool jacuzzi so you can cool off on those hot Cartagena days!

We delight in delighting our guests, and most who stay with us wind up extending for more days. We are family owned and operated and are accustomed to giving great personal service. Our mattresses are top quality and very comfortable and the privacy of our capsule style beds gives our guests a measure of privacy in their own space.

We are knowledgeable about the area's attractions, plus tours and activities, and can book many of them directly for you.

We have four great social areas: the patio and jacuzzi; the sundeck; the library and the air conditioned restaurant/co-working space.

We have great, fast WiFi throughout the hostel, plus you can ask Alexa to play your favorite music in our patio.

We hope you come and stay with us. We offer for free many amenities that other hostels charge for.

Hasta Pronto!

Duvis y Lorenzo

Towel service included, 24 hour air conditioning,

-We serve breakfast from 08:30 to 10:00am

-Check out before 12:00.

description.description: Take advantage of our October special! We have lowered prices on all dorms. And we have added a no breakfast option for the 17 bed dorm. content.value: Bourbon St Boutique Hostel has 3 dorms, each dorm has two full bathrooms, 42 beds in total (each bed is a private pod with its own black out, 2 plugins, and a night light so you will enjoy complete privacy in a dorm bed), all the hostel has A/C 24/7 to cool off the warm Cartagena weather, we also have a small pool, a kitchenette, 24/7 bilingual and local receptionist , free breakfast, wi-fi, DirecTV, lockers, bar at the pool and discounts in our award winning Bourbon St Bar-Restaurant with live music and dj’s just steps from the hostel, where a mix of locals and travelers always hang out. Located in Cartagena de Indias, 1.5 km from San Felipe de Barajas Castle, Cartagena Friends Hostel provides accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a garden and barbecue facilities. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property.
The units in the hostel are equipped with a coffee machine. All units at Cartagena Friends Hostel include air conditioning and a wardrobe.
Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast.
Guests at Cartagena Friends Hostel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Cartagena de Indias, like cycling.
Cartagena's Walls is 2.2 km from the hostel, while Steps of La Popa Mount is 2.3 km away. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 3.4 km from Cartagena Friends Hostel.

description.description: We are set in Cartagena, Colombia, our hostel have 6 rooms, 3 private rooms and 3 shared rooms, we are located close to the old town, airport, beach and malls, all the rooms have air conditioned, we have a shared kitchen and a lounge zone with tv and shared book. We can offer the Pick up from airport to the hostel.

content.value:
El Arsenal Hostel Boutique is located in front of the bay inside the old town in one of the most beautiful streets in Cartagena. The hostel is located at 50 meters from the convention centre, 150 meters from the clock tower, 100 meters from Plaza de la Trinidad, 300 meters from plaza Bolivar, The cathedraL and the Inquisision Palace, 300 meters from San Pedro Church, 400 meters from Plaza Santo Domingo, 150 meters from La Bodeguita port, 2.0 km from Boca Grande.

We have different types of dorm: 10, 8, 6, 4 and 3 beds and 3 privates rooms. Every room has air conditioner and fans. Dorms are equipped with readings lights in every bed and electrical plug for electronic devices. We have 2 privates with sea view and balcony and private bathroom and one private with shared bathroom.

Guests at the hostel can enjoy a continental breakfast.
You can play billiards and table tennis at El Arsenal Hostel Boutique.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include San Felipe de Barajas Castle, Cartagena de Indias Convention Centre and Cartagena's Modern Art Museum. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 7 km from El Arsenal Hostel Boutique.

description.description: Each bed at El Arsenal Hostel Boutique has it's own night light and 2 plugins for electronic devices, has A/C for your comfort in all rooms, a big pool, kitchen full equipped, laundry service. El Arsenal Hostel Boutique has an outdoor swimming pool, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Cartagena de Indias. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features evening entertainment and a concierge service.

content.value:
Our rooms are comfortable and clean, the privates one have air conditioner and private bathroom with amenities. Also, guest on a budget do also have a place with us, our shared rooms are very clean and organized, providing the same level of comfort without hurting your wallet.

-No curfew.
-Non smoking.
-Reception available 24 hours.

- Breakfast in NOT included, it has a extra price.


All children are welcome in our Hostel, There is no capacity for extra beds in the rooms, Wi-Fi is available in the public areas and in the rooms and it is free of charge, for late check out it will have an extra cost depends of a what time does the person leaves.

Santo Domingo Vidal is a colonial style house surrounded by traditional local families in the most charming neighborhood of Cartagena. In here you will be able to experience the real spirit of the city in it’s historical sense and also enjoy the vivid culture of cartageneros’ modern life. We will be glad to provide all the information you need with an unique personal touch, and always with the typical caribbean good mood.

description.description: Hostal Santo Domingo Vidal is located in a picturesque colonial style house with a nice balance between the modernity and the old republic charm. Hostal Santo Domingo Vidal is is a ideal location.Nearby, just minutes away, you will find all the monuments and historic sites; our team are able to provide you with all the information that you will need, as well organized various tours or plans fitted to your needs.

content.value:
Mi Llave Hostels Cartagena has a communal area where you can eat a snack, drink some coffee or a delicious natural juice. we also offer satellite tv where you can watch the most entertaining sports. In addition you will find a large kitchen where you can prepare your own food. We also offer a nice rooftop where you can relax and enjoy a beautiful sunny day!

Mi Llave Hostels Cartagena offers a total of 9 bedrooms between dorms and privates.
Some units at Mi Llave Hostels Cartagena include air conditioning and views of the sea or the city. They can be private or shared. A TV with cable is offered.
You will find a 24-hour front desk at Mi Llave Hostels Cartagena. Bicycle rental is available. Airport shuttles can be arranged for a surcharge.
The hostel is 600 m from Cartagena's Gold Museum and Palace of the Inquisition. Rafael Nuñez International Airport is 4.7 Km away.
Getsemani is a great choice for travellers interested in nightlife, culture and architecture.

description.description: Mi Llave Hostels Cartagena its a nice rebuilt Colonial house in Getsemani, located to 5-minute walk from the Plaza de la Trinidad, beautiful place to have a snack and meet some people and only 10 minute walk from the Walled City. Overlooking the sea and offering a restaurant and a terrace, Mi Llave Hostels Cartagena offers accommodation with free WiFi in Cartagena de Indias. A daily breakfast is served. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

content.value:
We offer a nice, clean, safe, comfortable and meaningful accommodation experience in a privileged location inside the walled city.

Four things make us unique:

1. Real Social Impact: By staying with us, conscious travelers like you contribute to the financial sustainability of FEM (25% of income and 12% of the hostel's profit are used to support FEM's operation and projects' expansion).

2. Location: Our privileged location in San Diego neighborhood, in the heart of the mystical walled city, allows you to be safe and at a walking distance to every spot in the city.

3. Facilities: Every room is equipped with comfortable beds, A/C, free WiFi and a locker or closet to store your belongings. We currently have:

o 2 shared rooms: where you will meet new friends to explore the city with. One of them accommodates 7 people and has a private bathroom. The other one accommodates 8 people and still has the original walls from 400 years ago, which gives it a magic atmosphere.

o 2 private rooms: where you will enjoy a calm and quiet ambiance with your couple or a friend.

4. Everything you need in the same place:

• Meet: Share a beer with new friends on our patio’s parasols, read a book on our hammocks or have a free coffee on our social room while you meet fellow travelers and volunteers.

• Have fun: Take one of our non-conventional Insider Tours that will allow you to merge with the authentic local culture and explore the unseen Cartagena (#RutaChampetúa, #EnTuSalsa, #DrumSafari, #BazurtoMarketAdventure, #RutaZenú, among others)

• Taste: Cook your meals and store your food at our ample kitchen or delight yourself with caribbean or vegetarian food in one of our neighbor restaurants (conveniently located on our street).

• Shop: Buy one of our local-made souvenirs to support the communities we work with.

• Work: Check your e-mail, attend that Skype call and get your work done at our calm and fresh (A/C equipped) co-working space

• Get involved: Meet FEM’s staff and volunteers! We’ll be glad to show you what we do so you can get involved or spread the word.

Policies & Conditions:

• Check in: from 14:00 to 22:00
• Check out: 11:00
• Payment upon arrival by cash or card.
• Taxes not included: 19% only for Colombian people
• Cancellation policy: 24 hours before arrival.
• Child friendly.
• Reception available 24 hours

description.description: Volunteer Hostels is a social business that works to build a more equitable society through responsible tourism. Based on a qualified volunteering model we team up with our Foundation (FEM: which has been working with afro and indigenous communities in Cartagena for 7 years) to provide technical capacity to the communities who need it the most.

content.value:
The Icon Capsule Hostel is located in one of the best and beautiful streets of the walled city in the historic town of Cartegena de Indias between two of its main squares, Plaza Fernadez de Madrid and Plaza San Diego. Popular places of interest near the hostel include Plaza San Diego, Plaza Fernandez de Madrid, the vaults, the clock tower, Plaza Bolivar, the Palace of the Inquisition among many others including popular restaurants and bars.

We have both shared dorms and private rooms.

The Icon Capsule Hostel features a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a bar and shared lounge in Cartagena de Indias. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.
The units in the hostel are equipped with a kettle.
Guests at The Icon Capsule Hostel can enjoy a continental breakfast.
The accommodation offers a terrace.

Popular points of interest near The Icon Capsule Hostel include Cartagena's Walls, Bolivar Park and Cartagena's Gold Museum. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 7 km from the hostel.
San Diego is a great choice for travellers interested in architecture, food and history.

description.description: Welcome to The Icon Capsule Hostel, a brand new type of accommodation in Cartagena with 24 hours A/C in each room, hot water, pool, rooftop bar, Jacuzzi, solarium and a beautiful communal kitchen. Furthermore, breakfast is included and we have 2 restaurants where you can order sea food, Turkish food and more without moving yourself from the hostel! Finally, we got free high speed WiFi for all our guests.

content.value:
We are one block away from La Trinidad Square, the best place to have dinner, a beer or just hang out with friends and meet new people. The Cuban Salsa bar – Café Havana, Vueltabajero salsa bar and Bazurto social club are just 2 minutes away by walk, all the museums and historic areas are 5 minutes away by walk.

We offer an excellent location with a cozy patio and jacuzzi. We have 6 rooms all of them with lockers and air conditioning, two 10-bed mix dormitories with two floor, metal, bed bug free, bunk bed, and private courtain, a four people private room, and three double private, all of them with TV and bathroom en suite. Breakfast is of course included.

Located in the Getsemani district of Cartagena de Indias, Espiritu Santo by Maos is less than 1 km from San Felipe de Barajas Castle and 2.2 km from Cartagena's Walls. Around 2.6 km from Bolivar Park, the property is also 2.6 km away from Cartagena's Gold Museum and offers free WiFi. Palace of the Inquisition is 2.6 km away and Steps of La Popa Mount is 3.5 km from the hostel.

An American breakfast is served daily at the property.

The property has a hot tub.

Non-stop guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Spanish.

Cartagena de Indias Convention Centre is 1.6 km from the hostel. Rafael Nunez International Airport is 6 km away.

description.description: We are in the middle of one of the most traditional streets of Getsemany Neighbourhood, Calle del Espiritu Santo.We have prepared each bed and space to offer the best experience for backpackers in Cartagena starting with our receptionist, followed by our Super Top comfortable mattresses and finishing with our beautiful backyard with a Jacuzzi,Bar, roof top and trees of plantain and fruits.

content.value:
We have a bar, but we still let you bring your own alcohol into the hostel, unlike most hostels in Cartagena. Imagine the savings you will make right here!

We let your friends visit you inside Mamallena. Many hostels will only allow paying guests inside. As long as your friends our respectful of the hostel and our other guests, and buy a few drinks from the bar, then they are more than welcome.

Our latest big news is that we have now installed a 100 megabyte fiber optics internet system. It seems to cover all the rooms and so far no complaints, fingers crossed it continues like that!! This is the best internet available in all of Colombia, and now available in Mamallena.

As a backpacker you choose a hostel for the atmosphere, the value and the information provided to make to make the most of your trip. We have plenty of space to chill and meet others, and just relax in the heat of the day. Our staff can provide all the information you need to know about what to do in Cartagena and how to continue your journey. We can make bookings for buses for onward travel as well as trips to Playa Blanca, Santa Marta/Taganga and boats to Panama if thats where you are heading. If you want a nice little, undiscovered beach town, then also check out our hostel in Rincon del mar, 3 hours from cartagena.

Our standard rooms have private bathrooms and AC(including dorms) and most(but not all) are pretty spacious. We don't consider ourselves a party hostel, but we're not boring either. There's usually something going on in the patio or the bar. Wednesday is party night on Calle Media Luna, right in front of the hostel. It's one of the best nights out in Cartagena and there's usually plenty of people at the hostel enjoying it before heading out.

Our bar is at the front of the hostel and usually open till 1 or 2am. We have a great deal of 2 for 1 drink specials that last all day as well as your normal selection of drinks.

We also have a guest kitchen, although its kinda small, dont say you weren't warned, Its not our fault, the building was built that way! Feel free to use it when you like, but if its as little under stocked its cause everything was stolen :(

If you like animals then you'll feel right at home here. We have our resident, and friendly, dog, cats and an apparent constant flow of kittens.

description.description: At Hostel Mamallena(RNT 27977) we pride ourselves on great customer service and providing a real backpacker experience. We also provide three things that most hostels in Cartagena dont. Airconditioning is available 24 hours in all our dorms and privates, except the basic single private (fan). Most places in Cartagena only have it available at night, and you will appreciate the difference.

content.value: Media Luna is located in the area of Getsemani, which forms the artistic heart of the city's urban culture. Several well-known landmarks like the San Felipe Fort and the romantic historical center, as well as the trendiest bars and local restaurants, are all within a few minutes walk. If you wish to explore further you can also rent bikes at the hostel!

In the open-air kitchen you can prepare your own food or cook a group dinner for your new mates. In addition , the breakfast is included ,there is a free Wi-Fi in the hostel area, computers, tv-room, laundry, luggage storage and lockers. You can also book excursions or a bus to the next destination of your adventure.

The sunny patio forms the heart of the hostel during the day time, but at the night time the center of the action is at the roof top bar and terrace with cold drinks and a spectacular view over the city. Don't miss the famous Media Luna Mega Party on Wednesdays it flies you over the moon!
In the Hostel we have private rooms and shared dormitories, all with air conditioning and locker which must bring its own padlock.
We also have a Hostel on Barú Island which is located on a private beach, which you can change one night of your stay here from the Hostel in Cartagena to the Hostel in Barú.

description.description: Media Luna Hostel is a unique combination of chill-out backpacker vibes and the historical feel of Cartagena. The old colonial building sheds a magical setting for enjoying a cold beer with your fellow travelers, sun-bathing at the lush patio or dipping into the refreshing pool to escape the heat of the Caribbean.

content.value:
Our hostel is located in Calle del Pozo, just beside the vibrant Plaza de la Trinidad. This Plaza is the hub of the coolest neighborhoods in Cartagena, Getsemani. Casa del Pozo Boutique Hostel is the brand new solution for your staying in Cartagena, We are located in the heart of Getsemani, the bohemian part of Cartagena. We are 2 mins walk from Plaza de la Trinidad, 10 mins from the Walled City and 15 mins from the beach. We are in a very strategic location close to all the main tourist attractions.

For your staying in Casa del Pozo Boutique Hostel you can choose between a private room or a bed in a 6-bed dormitory. Our beds are made keeping in mind all the needs of a backpacker: reading light, 2 usb plugins for electronic devices, shelf for laptop, curtain for your privacy and a private locker. By staying with us you get tons of daily freebies, including the delicious breakfast until 11, free Salsa classes, free Spanish Language Survival Course and least but not last free WiFi!!

description.description: Our hostel has: an amazing bar where our guests are spoiled with delicious food and fresh drinks, a cozy pool with bar area where to chill during the warmest hours and a relaxing area with A/C, 58' TV with Netflix, Internet station, books and more. Casa del Puerto Hostel & Suites is a new, totally rebuilt Mansion. Located in Manga, a peacefully district in a central area of Cartagena de Indias, close to all the touristic points. Casa del Puerto will be your oasis of peace during your stay in Colombia.

node.hostelName: El Castillo del Marquez by Biscanna Hostels

content.value:
We are located in the neighborhood of Manga, one of the best areas of the city. Our hostel is located just one block from the beautiful Manga Bay, where you can admire the sailboats that adorn it and walk around while admiring the sunset. There you will find a wide variety of restaurants and green areas near the sea.

Set in Cartagena de Indias, 1.7 km from San Felipe de Barajas Castle, El Castillo del Marques By Biscanna Hostels offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and currency exchange for guests.
At the hostel, the rooms are fitted with a patio with a garden view. At El Castillo del Marques, the rooms are equipped with a seating area.
Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.
El Castillo del Marques By Biscanna Hostels offers a barbecue.
The property has a hairdresser's and business centre.

Cartagena's Walls is 3 km from the hostel, while Bolivar Park is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International, 7 km from El Castillo del Marques, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description.description: Hostal El Castillo del Marquez by Biscanna Hostels is located in Cartagena de Indias, just 10 minutes from the historic city center. The house was built in 1940 and was declared a national relic. Surrounded by lush trees and majestic French-style gardens, with multiple terraces ideal for enjoying the outdoors. Rooms with free wifi, air conditioning, equipped kitchen, recreation areas, free parking area, reception open 24/7.

content.value:
Pastelillo, icon of colonial architecture. The area has a beautiful pedestrian promenade overlooking the sea and public green areas for exercises or yoga, while you are accompanied by the beautiful natural melody of the waves of the sea and the sea breeze.

We have 7 comfortable bedrooms in the property with capacity for 32 people.

Peregrinos Hostel Cartagena de Indias features air-conditioned rooms with cable flat-screen TV in the Manga district of Cartagena de Indias. Offering a shared lounge, the property is located within 1.9 km of San Felipe de Barajas Castle. The hostel features an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property.
At the hostel all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe and a private bathroom.
Guests at Peregrinos Hostel Cartagena de Indias can enjoy an American breakfast.
Cartagena's Walls is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Bolivar Park is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 7 km from Peregrinos Hostel Cartagena de Indias.

description.description: Peregrinos Hostel Cartagena de Indias is located on the neighborhood of Manga, just five minutes walking from the Historic Center of Cartagena de Indias and about 60 meters from the Bay of Cartagena, where the main marinas of the city and the fort of Cartagena are located.

content.value:
If you Stay in our hostal helps to combat this phenomenon since our collaborators are natives of the area and are linked to our project in a very narrow way, this allows that we can all continue to enjoy the neihgborhood with the original soul that can only be given the people of Raizales of Getsemany
In addition to helping, for a fair price you can stay in a place with heart and soul with all the facilities (breakfast, wifi, towels, a large patio) so that your stay will be the most comfortable possibleOur communal outside courtyard makes it very easy for meeting fellow backpackers and like minded travelers.

Also We Know that your favorites words are Free & Save And this is that you will find in Tree House enjoy our fair prices 'Also we have the perfect location in Getsemani we are 1 block from plaza la trinidad,inside the walled city and a 2-15 minute walk from all of the hottest clubs,(Cafe Habana is just two streets) restaurants and bars ( 3 minuts to juan valdez cafe) in Cartagena!lease note.

description.description: In our Hostel we believe in social and responsible tourism and thanks to your support we can help the people that the growing tourism affected. Many people like you, want to know and live Getsemani for its cultural diversity that makes it a vibrant and worthy neighborhood to know this fact that local people due to the high prices of houses by the pressure of tourism are leaving the neighborhood where they have lived for generations.

content.value:
Santuario Hostel is located in the beautiful and bohemian neighborhood Getsemaní at Cartagena de Indias, at Pedregal Street.

The shared rooms are made by cubicles and a blackout achieving a light and sound insulation, giving an excellent experience of privacy. Each cubicle is equipped with its own light, bedside table, shelves, safe to use with padlock, electric socket with USB and closet for storing luggage with padlock.

Boasting a bar, shared lounge, garden and free WiFi, Santuario Hostel Cartagena is set in Cartagena de Indias, 600 m from San Felipe de Barajas Castle and 1.9 km from Cartagena's Walls. Featuring a barbecue, this property is located a short distance from Cartagena de Indias Convention Centre, Cartagena's Modern Art Museum and Rafael Nunez House. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and organising tours for guests.
All guest rooms at the hostel come with a private bathroom fitted with a shower.
A à la carte breakfast is available every morning at Santuario Hostel Cartagena.
The accommodation offers a hot tub. You can play darts at Santuario Hostel Cartagena, and bike hire is available.

Bolivar Park is 2.3 km from the hostel, while Cartagena's Gold Museum is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International, 6 km from Santuario Hostel Cartagena, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description.description: Our property has a privileged view to the castle of San Felipe de Barajas and is a few minutes walk from the main tourist points of the historical center, like the Museum of the Gold of Cartagena, the statue of the India Catalina, the square of the Most Holy Trinidad and Bolivar Park.

content.value: Wonderland is a party hostel, but not 24/7. We have special events with local artists and DJ’s, and costeños (people from Cartagena) who come to hang out with us. Party days can get crazy, so be ready to join in and have fun!! There’s music every day, but we take requests so generally it’s an eclectic international mix. Quiet hours are midnight to 7am. If you want to continue the party, we have free entrances to the best local clubs.

Surprise activities are always happening as well. Our staff organizes activities based on what you want…a visit to the local market, ping-pong tournaments (or beer pong depending on the day!), bike tours, soccer matches, cooking lessons, food tours, or learn to dance to the most popular music in Cartagena (Champeta) local style.

During the day the pool and bar are open. The kitchen is available if you prefer to cook your own meals. Or if the heat is too much, you can chill (literally) in the Netflix room.
We can help with tours and recommendations, and tips and tricks to make sure you get the best prices instead of the tourist version. Luggage storage is also available if you decide to take a short trip to the islands.
Check out social media for more details or if you have questions prior to arrival, your Wonderland family is happy to help!

description.description: Experience the real Cartagena in Wonderland. Located in the best neighborhood with everything you need in walking distance…airport, beaches, park with bike trails & skateboarding, supermarkets, ATM’s, restaurants. And when you want to be a tourist, it’s only a few minutes by taxi or bus, then you can come back and cool down with the ocean breeze in the pool and drinks at the bar.

content.value:
The hostel is located in the Getsemani neighborhood, just outside of Cartagena's historic Old City. The area is surrounded with cultural meeting points such as Trinidad Plaza where guest can enjoy a taste of Cartagena's cultural expositions: music, dance, food, amongst others. Just steps from the convention center, where main city events occur, our location will allow easy access to entertainment in the city.

In our property we offer 2 type of shared rooms 4 beds and 7 beds, both with shared washrooms, for a total of 4 shared rooms. Each room has air conditioning and lockers available to store personal belongings. Private rooms have en-suite washrooms, tv, air conditioning.

Life is Good Cartagena Hostel has a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Cartagena de Indias. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property.
All rooms at the hostel have air conditioning and a wardrobe.
Guests at Life is Good Cartagena Hostel can enjoy a continental breakfast.
The accommodation offers a hot tub. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Life is Good Cartagena Hostel.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include San Felipe de Barajas Castle, Cartagena de Indias Convention Centre and Cartagena's Modern Art Museum. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 7 km from Life is Good Cartagena Hostel.
Getsemani is a great choice for travellers interested in nightlife, culture and architecture.

description.description: Life is Good Cartagena are brand new accommodation and have air conditioning, as well as en-suite washrooms, breakfast is included in the price of the reservation and restaurant on-site, guests can enjoy ceviches, pastas and freshly squeezed juices, amongst other services. Our facilities include laundry services, transfers from and to the airport to our premises, a communal kitchen allows guest to cook meals during the length of their stay, free WiFi and a sun terrace with jacuzzi, Life is Good Cartagena Hostel has no elevators on-site.

content.value:
The delicious breakfast buffet is included and served from 8-10 am, if you`re looking for some adventure we have a lot to offer including a motorbike rental station with different types of motorbike, (125cc-660cc) and an automatic scooter, we also offer motorcycle tours to the mud volcano, the pink ocean, Punta Icaco, La Boquilla and Barù-Playa Blanca.Motorbikes are one of the best ways to explore this amazing country. If you like swimming and beaches away from the crowd we also offer overnight sailing trips to Cholon and Rosario Islands that include snorkeling and the chance to see fluorescent plankton at night.

We offer shared rooms and a private room. Each room has a bathroom, air conditioning 24/7 and lockers available to store personal belongings. Many people say we are the cleanest hostel they have ever stayed in. Our staff is 100% devoted to serving you the best way possible.

Located in Cartagena de Indias, 1.4 km from San Felipe de Barajas Castle, Bike Dive Hostel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a bar and a terrace. A hot tub and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and currency exchange for guests.
At the hostel, every room is equipped with a private bathroom with a shower.
A continental breakfast is available daily at Bike Dive Hostel.

Cartagena's Walls is 2.6 km from the accommodation, while Bolivar Park is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International, 7 km from Bike Dive Hostel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description.description: Bike and Dive Hostel is located in a safe and hip neighbourhood, called Manga, only a 15 minute walk away from the old city and a 5 minute walk from Getsemani, There are nearly 70 restaurants in a 6 block radius a food court across the street and a 24/7 supermarket. We pride ourselves on great customer service and being the best hosts in Cartagena. We are a hostel for travellers, tourist and anyone who wants to go on an adventure and have the time of their life.

content.value:
We are located at the beach called Playa de Manzanillo which is about 10 minutes away from the airport. Next to us there are some famous hotels like Melia, Karmairi or Estrellar. When you reach to Melia Hotel just go to the beach and turn to the right. Walk 300 meters and you will find us. Check out our homepage if you need more information how to find us.

All of our rooms provide a lot of space and have their own bathroom as well as their own balcony. Any reservation for any room you make includes a breakfast which usually costs between COP 13´000 and COP 15´000 for guests who don´t stay at our hostel.

Set in Cartagena de Indias, 17 km from Cartagena's Walls, Zion Beach House offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a garden. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation features evening entertainment and free WiFi throughout the property.
At the hostel all rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a shower.
Guests at Zion Beach House can enjoy a continental breakfast.
Steps of La Popa Mount is 17 km from the accommodation, while Bolivar Park is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 16 km from Zion Beach House.

At our spot we offer Campers a great view on the beach, a clean external bathroom with shower and toilet, electricity if needed, wifi, night security, and a nice breakfast for COP 30´000.- per person and night. Contact us by phone or e-mail to check availability and reserve your spot in front of the beach!

description.description: Our hostel is directly located at the beach. It is supposed to especially attract people who prefer to relax at a lonely beach or that are keen on water sports like kite surfing, as with Pure Kite surf we have one of the best Kite surf schools in Colombia. The evening programs are filled with barbecues, poker-tournaments, volley ball, pub crawls and a lot more fun activities, so our guests never get bored. Our rooms have an amazing sea view and the private room and the 4-bed dorm deluxe have A/C. A rich breakfast is included for every guest.

content.value:
One Day Hostel is situated in the Getsemani district in Cartagena de Indias, 800 metres from Cartagena's Gold Museum and 800 metres from San Felipe de Barajas Castle.

One Day Hostel features free WiFi throughout the property. A flat-screen TV is offered.

You will find a 24-hour front desk and gift shop at the property.

You can play darts at the hostel. Palace of the Inquisition is 800 metres from One Day Hostel, while Bolivar Park is 900 metres away. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 4 km from One Day Hostel.

Each shared dorm at One Day Hostel features air conditioning, bed linen and functional décor. Bathrooms include a shower.

content.value:
Hello! We are a cheerful team full of energy, offering rooms for backpackers and travellers alike, in the colonial district of San Antonio, Cali, Colombia. Tostaky is a place where you relax and taste a little of the French and Colombian cultures, as well as other services. For more information please contact us. We welcome you to your home in Cali.

The Tostaky Hostel:

- A safe and clean place
- Hot water
- Free Internet, WI-FI
- Books exchange
- Tourist information
- Salsa and spanish lessons
- Bar / Restaurant every day
- Dormitory
- Single room with or whitout bahtroom
- Double room with or without bathroon

We create the environment and provide the space looking for authentic, true, sincere moments, founded on the respect of the other. We are facilitators of meetings, organizers of services. Also considered as hostel-food, you can enjoy Tostaky's cuisine daily. That process as the story of a Frenchman emigrated in the land of Cali, lover of the good life and the people. Founder of the idea, he relied on the multiple paths he crossed throughout his Colombian life. At your disposal you will always find a team full of energy and good humor.

description.description: Tostaky was born in May 2008 with a philosophy of sharing. Tostaky's first idea is a space that helps people, cultures, music and different flavors meet. Here we gather all nationalities, ages, languages, social classes. The word Tostaky was born from the mouth of the Mexican revolutionary Emiliano Zapata, and was also the title of a song and an album by the French group Noir Désir. Tostaky is simply the contraction of the phrase "Everything is Here." Its use always refers to solidarity, sharing and a fair and social vision of society. That is why we always work with local people, handle fair prices and support social processes such as the "foundation à ton étoile".

content.value:
We are located in a safe San Fernando neighborhood, with beautiful trees, parks and neo-colonial architecture from the 1930's. Within 3 minutes walking distance you will be in Parque del Perro park (named after a dog statue), a trendy, happening area with 2 supermarkets, ATMs, many restaurants, bars, cafes and authentic rumba and salsa Colombian night life.

We have a total of 24 beds with selection of dormitory and private rooms. All come with a fan, comfortable bed and a security locker. BREAKFAST IS OPTIONAL. We have tea and coffee available all day.

ADDITIONAL AMENITIES:
Dining/Lounge room
WI-FI
TV room
Paid laundry service
2 equipped kitchens
BBQ Terrace with music
Beverages and snacks for sale

We have 24 hour reception with our friendly staff ready to serve you

description.description: Welcome to Cali, ´The Capital of Salsa! At Sunflower hostel you will experience true Colombian hospitality! At our hostel you can take Salsa classes, Spanish classes or walk to the nearest school. You will also have tourist and cultural information you need to enjoy this wonderful city, its events, while exploring the beautiful 'Valle del Cauca' region of Colombia.

content.value:
At Hostal Encuentro,the terraces in the middle of the house give us an incredible view of the “Cerro de las Tres Cruces”, emblem of the city and give us the privilege of the breeze in the evenings. You can also take some salsa lessons here enjoying the view or just chill with other guests.The identity of our house is build up special details all over the house, full of colors and creativity designed by us, to make this a peaceful place with lots of tranquility.

Hostal Encuentro is part of one of the most traditional neighborhoods in Cali: San Antonio a privileged strategic location surrounded by hotels, restaurants, bars, clubs, cafes, parks and attractions, also easily accessible by public transport. It’s close to all the touristic part of Cali such us El Gato del Rio, La Ermita church, River Boulevard, El Peñon, downtown and museums.

We have 5 rooms for a total of 26 guests:
•Two private rooms, each of them with two double beds, fan, towels and wardrope.
•Three spacious rooms, the red with 6 single beds, the purple with 8 single beds and the yellow with 4 single beds and two bunk beds. All of them includes lockers, towels, fan and wifi.

We have a friend club that offers us its facilities, including its two swimming pools and place to enjoy the outdoors.

description.description:
Hostal Encuentro, a homelike place. (a homely place)
The place was the typical family house in Cali. It is attended by its owner, one of the 15 sisters of a large family. It is for that reason that it gives a good vibe and achieves the mix of attention and warmth. In this hostel you not only stay, you will be part of the "Encuentro" family. Once you understand that concept, you will not want to leave.

content.value:
With Cali being the Salsa Capital of the world, Havana Hostel and Dance School takes pride in adding to the community by offering complimentary dance lessons for their guests.

The property also offers free WiFi, a 24-hour front desk, and a beautiful terrace.

The property is in walking to distance to Parque del Perro, Parque Artesanal Loma de la Cruz, and many salsa clubs. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragon International Airport, 24 km from the property.

Providing free WiFi and a terrace, Havana offers rooms in Cali, 1.1 km from Pan-American Park and 3.5 km from Saint's Peter Cathedral. The property is around 3.5 km from Jorge Isaacs Theater, 3.7 km from La Ermita Church and 3.8 km from Cañaveralejo's Bullring. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen for guests.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Jorge Garcés Borrero Library, The Dog's Park and Artisan Park Loma de la Cruz. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International Airport, 24 km from Havana.

description.description: Experience everything Cali has to offer with the vibrant community at Havana Hostel & Dance School. Travelers from around the world gather for the unique experience they have carefully crafted for their guests. Enjoy panoramic views of the city, gather with others in one of their many community spaces, take part in various activities hosted at the property, and dance the night away at their dance school.

content.value:
The hostel is located in the pleasant and captivating neighborhood of San Antonio, one of the most emblematic areas of the city. Surrounded by typical restaurants and haute cuisine restaurants, theaters, home of artists, dance academies and the most popular salsa and crossover clubs of the moment in the city.
Nearby is “La Colina” of San Antonio, the center, the neighborhood “Granada”, “El Peñon”, “La Tertulia” Museum and around you will find a variety of the best gourmet restaurants in the area, theaters, art vibes, salsa schools and the most popular rumba clubs.

Shared dorms with private bathroom, comfortable and spacious cabins with orthopedic mattress, with light and power socket for each bed and safety lockers and some of the dorms have a air conditioner. Private room with a view, private bathroom, air conditioner, King size or Queen size bed. Hot water in all the showers.

Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, Blue Fox Hostel is set in Cali in the Valle del Cauca region, 1.5 km from Jorge Isaacs Theater and 1.6 km from La Ermita Church. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is situated 5 km from Cañaveralejo's Bullring and 30 km from National Natural Park Farallones de Cali.

Pan-American Park is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while Saint's Peter Cathedral is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International Airport, 22 km from Blue Fox Hostel.

description.description: We have a dream house and we have to offer our guests shared and private rooms, equipped kitchen, dinner area, laundry service beautiful patio/terrace with hammocks, pool, clay oven and soon a bar service. No matter what you choose, discomfort in the house of Blue is out of the question. All guest rooms at the japanese-style business hotel come with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Blue Fox Hostel offers a sun terrace. After a long journey, Blue Fox has found his home, and he’d like to share it with friends from around the world. It's the perfect place to meet new people, and share ideas, art, culture, experiences and dances!

content.value: Apolis Hostel in Cali provides adults-only accommodation with a shared lounge, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.
At the guest house, each room has a desk.
Pan-American Park is 2.2 km from Apolis Hostel, while Saint's Peter Cathedral is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

Additionally in the area there are restaurants, bakeries, low cost supermarket,bars, a wide range of commercial services , the public transport stop ( one block away), the public transport main station (4 blocks away), and several banks.ATM (crossing the street).

description.description: Located in the gastronomic and cultural heart of Cali, within walking distance to the famous Alameda market where the local food restaurants are, the “dog park”, the public city library, the salsa schools, the emblematic salsa clubs 'la topa tolondra' and 'tin tin deo', the acclaimed salsa show “El mulato cabaret”, and the stadium and others sport centers of the city; the traditional San Antonio neighborhood, and the city center.

content.value:
We are very Lucky to be in the middle of San Antonio, and we mean lucky, because we are a few blocks from almost everything in the city, 3 blocks from the San Antonio park and on the top of the hill the San Antonio chapel. We are just a few blocks from salsa clubs, dancing academies, best restaurant and cultural places of the city. Located in San Antonio Neighbourhood which is the Colonial area of the city, we are a few blocks from the Historical centre where you can find museums, theatres and historical spots of the city history, also the boulevard of the Cali's river its less than 10 min walking and the walk has a lot of street art. On top of the neighbourhood there is the 2nd oldest church in Cali with a little plaza and a big green park perfect to relax and chill. Loma de la Cruz its a park full of artisans stores. Kingbird Hostel has an amazing and popular park just a couple of blocks from the hostel, also we have the Loma de la ruz park which its the artisans and indigenous people park where on Thursdays night they have a traditional and ancestral Andean dance which no one should miss, also we go every Thursday with the guests 7 - 9 pm also on Wednesdays they do a poetry open space for everyone who wants to see some Spanish poetry live.We are less than 10 minutes walks from el Peñon park that its the neighbourhood after San Antonio, with many restaurants and bars, also with their central park or little plaza which on Sundays it became an outdoors gallery by painting artist that expose their paints during every Sunday also unmissable. We are 10 to 15 min walking from all this museums: Gold museum from the Calima Culture, Archaeological museum 'La Merced', the modern art museum 'La Tertulia', the Filmography museum call 'Caliwood' and many others very interesting and cool places that you need to find out. We are also around many and really good restaurants and coffee places, also bars and places to dance like academies and clubs.

Our rooms are very basic, but they all have their own windows and all the house has tall roof so the rooms are very fresh and comfortable, we also have a fan in every room, for extra freshness only need it when there is a lot of people, the beds are bunk beds comfortable and new, so you wont have the annoying noises and shakes that some bunk beds have in other places.

description.description:
We made dorms to receive travellers looking for a real local experience. Kingbird Hostel is located in the colonial neighbourhood of Cali so the house has colonial characteristics such as a tall roof and a inside garden that keeps the place super fresh.
We have coffee 24/7 and it's always hot! Also, as we live here, we often have our locals and foreign friends visiting us or joining us for a beer before going out, so a real exchange of experience with locals and foreigners will happen in the hostel. We love to go out together so we also have a lot of fun with Cali´s nightlife and at our local parties. Of course, we also go to popular bars and clubs where foreigners like to go, but we always try to do something different and unexpected in the city of Salsa.Kingbird hostel, more than a hostel its a home for friends, and we make this happen by living in the hostel, so we are three friends who after some time backpacking decided to move into a big house in the most traditional area of Cali. So what we are actually offering, its a unique local experience by living for a few days with us, your new friends in town. we are very kind and always ready to help. Guests give yourself the opportunity to stay in a place were you will be treat as a part of the family of travellers, sharing experiences and quality time, we are not a normal hostel, you will feel it right away, if you want to share your time with locals and in the best city of Colombia, this is your place, you wont regret. We know budget its important and even when the price its not the cheapest its pretty cheap, and besides all the comfort and commodities that you will find with hosts that will became your friends!

content.value: Hostal Ruta Sur, is located in the colonial district of San Antonio This is the perfect place to know Cali: safe, quiet and bohemian. You will have easy access to a wide range of restaurants, cafes and entertainment for all tastes and all pockets.
Comfortable rooms with regional décor can be enjoyed in Cali, a 5-minute walk from the Gold Museum and historical district. Free WiFi and local calls are included.
Hostal Rutal Sur offers 10 rooms with a private bathroom in a house decorated with plants, colourful tapestries and hammocks.
A Continental breakfast with tropical fruits and Colombian coffee can be enjoyed daily for an extra fee. In addition, guests will find a safety deposit box available in the front-desk.
You will find Cali's Zoo just a 5-minute drive away, La Tertulia Museum a 10-minute walk away and Alfonso Bonilla Aragon International Airport is 45 minutes away by car from Ruta Sur.

Our hostel is designed for the discerning traveler who values his peace, tranquility and comfort. That's why we offer clean rooms with private bathroom, full of vegetation common areas and a kitchen for the exclusive use of guests.  Enjoy Cali fully, and when you return to the hostel you will feel at home.

description.description: Hostal Ruta Sur is a warm and pleasant space where the traveler is not a guest, but an associate who is treated with deference, familiarity and warmth, is a friend, with many stories with a desire to share not space; But his life. The South Route Staff will always be at your disposal to provide the best services to our guests. Welcome to our Hostel.

content.value: Salsa classes, picnic nights at the park, city tour, excellent weather and location. comfortable private and shared rooms, balcony, 2 terraces, an external one with comfortable tables to enjoy and an internal one with solarium and jacuzzi with hydromassage to tan, read or relax a bit, agreement with salsa academy, picnic nights at the park in the traditional park of the dog with tablecloth, basket, dinner and wine included, tourist information of the city and events to be held in the city, family care, the best location in Cali and an excellent climate to enjoy your stay in our city.
We are also located in the traditional neighbourhood, San Fernando in Cali, three blocks from the famous park del Perro. It has private rooms with a balcony to the street and multiple rooms.

description.description: Hostal Mi Tierra offers everything you need to enjoy your stay common areas such as a terrace, a TV room, a kitchen equipped with a refrigerator and an oven, an dining room, terrace with solarium and jacuzzi, we have tourist information, salsa classes and yoga classes, picnic nights at the park.

content.value:

Each room here will provide you with a seating area. There is a full a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Extras include a washing machine, an outdoor seating area and a fan.

Each room here will provide you with a seating area. There is a full a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Extras include a washing machine, an outdoor seating area and a fan.

description.description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Hostal Pájara Pinta is located in Cali. Free WiFi access is available. content.value:
San Antonio is the first neighborhood created in the city; with its old houses, steep streets and a hill where the Cali breeze accompanies the best panoramic view of the city; inhabited by a community of professors, artists, artisans, literati among the new residents who start their restaurants, cafes and shops to serve tourists.

Five rooms with name and characteristics of the most famous coffee drinks: Mokaccino, capuccino, espresso, machiatto and “Tinto”; the latter in honor of the most typical coffee drink in Colombia that is shared with everyone, that is why it is the mixed bedroom. The other four rooms are private and all share 3 bathrooms at home, a kitchen, TV room with DVD and movies, PC and WIFI.


Casa Cafe Guesthouse is located 1.5 km from Jorge Isaacs Theater and offers accommodation with a restaurant, free bikes and a 24-hour reception. Free WiFi is available throughout.
There is also a shared lounge area.

There are several places of interest near the bed and breakfast, such as the La Ermita church, the Loma de la Cruz craft park and the La Tertulia Museum of Modern Art. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International Airport, 22 km from La Casa Cafe Guesthouse. The property offers an airport shuttle service for a fee.

description.description: Our Guest house was the pioneer of its kind, settling in a house of republican style; wooden floors and ceilings in the historical and cultural heritage conservation sector of our city; San Antonio. With rooms that are named coffee drinks, a cafe where you can taste the best of the region's farmer. It becomes the best choice for travelers who love local experiences on their trip.

content.value:
You can find a few blocks away all kind of restaurants, pubs, museums, the most famous clubs and remarkable spots like Boulevard del Río, Gato del Río, City Theater Enrique Buenaventura, Sebastián de Belalcazar Statue and Jairo Valera Square, Loma de la Cruz and City Zoo.

All rooms are designed to keep the comfort and provide functionality. The single beds rooms have a wardrobe with coat racks and hangers, wall-mounted fan and door knob with key. Dorms are equipped with reading lights and power outlet for every bed, lockers with one key for every guest, wall-mounted fans and coat racks.

Hostal El Aguacate is located in Cali and offers adults-only accommodation with a shared lounge and garden. It also has a shared kitchen, concierge service and free Wi-Fi throughout. The property is 2.8 km from Pan-American Park and 2.9 km from San Pedro Cathedral.
The accommodations have a stove.
The property serves an à la carte breakfast.
Hostal El Aguacate has a solarium.

The most popular attractions near the accommodation include the Jorge Isaacs theater, La Ermita church and the Loma de la Cruz craft park. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International Airport, located 22 km from Hostal El Aguacate.

description.description: El Aguacate Hostel is located in Cali, in the heart of San Antonio, the main traditional cultural and gastronomic zone in the city, right in front of the renowned Colina San Antonio. We offer a unique experience in Cali through a very good service, comfortable and functional facilities and cultural exchange activities. Let’s take some salsa lessons or have more fun in our language exchange nights!

content.value:
The maison violette is very close to many places of tourist and cultural interest. We have the artisanal park Loma de la Cruz where are the shops of artisans of the area and point of cultural gatherings like the Andean dances every Thursday night. We are 300 meters from the church of San Antonio a building dating from the seventeenth century.

We offer private rooms as well as well as dormitories, each of our private rooms with ensuite bathroom and hot water is fully renovated in colonial style preserving the characteristic of the San Antonio neighborhood. A common kitchen, a commune area with balcony and WiFi as well as free coffee all day, towels and soap is included. From our rooftop you have a magnificent view over the city and its sunsets and this is a perfect spot to enjoy the evening.
A secured parking lot is available for a small fee at only two blocks from our property.

description.description: La Maison Violette offer an variate of rooms very colourful and pleasant all preserve the colonial style that characterizes the neighborhood in addition to the personal seal and family atmosphere of our house. We have different types of rooms for each taste and according to the needs of our client. We have suites with balconies for groups and families.

content.value:
Located in the heart of the colonial district, our place take place in a neighborhood full of history and architecture. Alternately, a land of breeders, a popular district and an artist district, it now plays the role of The Old Cali. You will find a great cultural and culinary offer as well as various establishments to discover Cali by Night.

You will love our activities :
YOGA CLASSES - Monday - wednesday - friday 10:30 to 11:30 am
SALSA CLASSES - Monday to saturday 06:30 to 07:30 pm

Rossa Palma provides cozy dorms and private bedrooms.

description.description: No matter the reason of your trip, whether you are there for the incredible treks of the area, learning salsa or simply visiting the city we will make sure you have an unforgettable time with us. Our space has a Bar-Restaurant, a swimming pool, 2 terraces. For our nomadic friends, a work room with high-speed internet is also at your disposal.

content.value: Fatima beach is selling a hostel in Santa Marta with 70 beds, in the historical centre near Parque de los Novios. It's 5 blocks from the beach and has 18 bathrooms, a bar, restaurant, a beautiful open public space as well as a rooftop and a jacuzzi.
The hostel is in a fantastic location near supermarkets, local shops, main roads and it's just 5 blocks from the beach.
We offer customers food, drinks, accommodation for groups and activities such as dance classes, beer pong, karaoke and more!

description.description:
Fatima beach is selling a hostel in Santa Marta with 70 beds, in the historical centre near Parque de los Novios. It's 5 blocks from the beach and has 18 bathrooms, a bar, restaurant, a beautiful open public space as well as a rooftop and a jacuzzi.

The hostel is in a fantastic location near supermarkets, local shops, main roads and it's just 5 blocks from the beach.

content.value:
Enjoy our FREE DAILY ACTIVITIES, these include salsa lessons, circus shows, and salsa shows. We are a hostel and a salsa school, and we are constantly looking for ways to give back to the community. Because of this, in Cali, we work with the foundation ‘My body, my story’. Through booking private lessons, you are not only learning how to dance but also contributing to help vulnerable children through the arts, located in a colonial house in the historic neighborhood of San Antonio.


During the day, explore the streets of San Antonio and go for a local food tasting at the fruit market. If you prefer, spend all day tanning and enjoy a cocktail by the pool. At night, the salsa drums begin, learn some moves at the hostel and go show them off at the clubs in Cali! After all, Cali is known as ‘The salsa capital of the world’.

Welcome to our traveller community! Don't forget to check out our other hostels in Colombia: Cartagena, Salento, San Andrés Island, and Tayrona, and in Uruguay: Colonia, Montevideo and Pedrera.

description.description: Follow the sound of music straight into our salsa classrooms! Put on a bathing suit and get ready to enjoy the sun by the pool...welcome to Viajero Cali! An outdoor swimming pool and salsa lessons can be enjoyed in Cali, a 10-minute walk from the historical district. Wi-Fi is free and Chipichape Shopping Centre is a 15-minute drive. El Viajero Cali Hostel & Salsa School has rooms with shared bathroom facilities and work desks. Some rooms may feature TVs.

content.value:
Pixel Art Hostel is a typical San Antonio house, designed with the participation of many graffiti artists, painters, recycling of paintings and details in each of its spaces. It's a caleño art museum, it's a graffiti tour ...
The decoration is the hallmark of this place, every detail was designed to stop you at every corner. In the end, you will stop on the terrace of the hostel or maybe our TV room will surprise you. There is also a kitchen for you to enjoy: comfortable, spacious and with enough utensils.

Pixel Art Hostel is located in the San Antonio neighborhood, which is the place of the traveler par excellence, is famous and recognized as a traditional neighborhood, for its history and colonial architecture. The houses decorated with different colors, and the magic of their pots. Cali is the world capital of salsa and Afro music of the Latin American Pacific (Petronio Alvarez - August). In addition, if you visit this city, you should try a local delicacy called cholao or scrape, tour the boulevard del rio, go to a football match, eat typical dishes, and meet local people.

At Pixel Art Hostel we respect good rest (NOT A PARTY HOSTEL). We have modern shared and personalized rooms. Each bed has a space for your backpack and towel, each bed is equipped with electricity, light and USB charger.

We have: laundry service

24 hour reception

description.description: PIXEL ACTIVITIES: Group or private salsa classes (free and paid) - group tours in the city - Spanish classes for foreigners - group meals (roasts, pizzas, bbq) - movie nights - hiking - tours to San Cipriano and Buenaventura - tours to football matches - graffiti tour - friendly hostels in Colombia - bike rental - access to a club with 2 free swimming pools (10 minutes from the hostel) - salsa nights - cultural exchange - tourist information - transfers to the terminal and the airport - FREE DRAWING CLASSES.

content.value:
We are located in the front of the Cali River near San Antonio, at 10-minute walk from the historic center of Cali, Granada and El Peñón (important gastronomic centers and many café / bar). Only 4 blocks from the zoo, , very close to the Alferez Real events center and La Tertulia theater, at side the road to the Pacific Ocean and close to trails to go to the main viewpoints of the city: Las Tres Cruces (This mountain 1465 meters above sea level is the favorite place for Cali people and visitors for a walk and exercise), Cristo Rey and Sebastián de Belalcázar. Ten steps from the bus stop and close to several supermarkets.

We will gladly help you plan any city tour and as we are extreme sport lovers, we love making adventure tourism:
- Tandem paraglider flights
- Paragliding courses for beginners


We also offer laundry service and airport Transportation.

Taxes included only for foreign tourists.
No curfew.

We are subject to Colombian law and we have a policy of sustainability that includes the rejection of exploitation, pornography, sex tourism and any other form of sexual abuse in children and adolescents; In compliance with LAW 679 of 2001

description.description: We have everything you need to make you feel at home: A house full of nature, with a balcony to overlooking the street, a awesome garden, equipped kitchen, patios, wifi/internet, book exchange. Our rooms are comfortable and have excellent mattresses, sheets and personal towel.

content.value:
Padma House Hostel & Café is attractively situated in the colonial heart of the city, the neighborhood of San Antonio, at the west area of Cali. Our location, is very close to down town and the main tourist attractions. At this area, you’ll also find lots of amazing food places and bars nearby. Popular points of interest close to Padma House Hostel & Cafe includes, San Antonio Chruch, Peñon Park, Cali's city Theatre, Artisan Park Loma de la Cruz, Modern Art Museum La Tertulia, Ermita Church and Cristo Rey. We can conveniently provide information at the reception to help you to get around the area.

In Padma House we have 4 different rooms: 2 dormitories and 2 private rooms. Our dormitories are the perfect option for those who love intercultural exchanges and stick into a budget. The first dormitory is equipped with 7 beds: 2 bunk beds of 3 tier and a single bed. And the second one, has 9 beds: 3 bunk beds of 3 tier. Bathrooms shared.
Our private rooms are equipped with double-sized bed and private bathroom. There is also a complementary option of a single extra bed in one of our private room, perfect for group of three people.

description.description: Padma House is a dream that came true since 2017. The lovely home was created by two world travellers and avid lovers of good coffee. Our life-philosophy is firmly grounded in the belief that everyone deserves to be happy and seek to share it, that’s why we help shape memorable experiences around travel and coffee. Our project is located in a beautiful structure that mixes colonial architecture with a rustic style. In-door gardens and open spaces accentuate the space. The large patio with hammocks and fruit trees are ideal for unwinding after a long day of exploration, sharing stories, enjoying some of the beverages from the house, practicing yoga, reading or any other outdoor hobby. Our café as a common area, is the ultimate space for those digital nomads and freelance professionals who are looking for a place with excellent wifi, good music and above all, the best Colombian coffee!

content.value:
Santiago D.C Hostal is 2.5 km from Pan-American Park and 2.6 km from Saint Peter's Cathedral. Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International Airport is 22 km away.Our guests are very happy with the location commenting that this part of Cali is their favorite, since the San Antonio neighborhood is multicultural and the location is central, having many tourist places within reach.

We have shared, private and family rooms for large and small groups of travelers.

The hostel Santiago DC offers a comfortable, clean and safe space ideal for resting.
It has shared , private and family rooms, TV room, Netflix, reading room, games room, solarium, showers, relaxation patio, terrace, cafeteria , free WiFi, salsa classes, bachata, yoga, barbecue and breakfast include

content.value:
La Clave Hostel has a 24-hour front desk so you don't have to worry about your arrival or departure, a living room to meet and share with new people, practice languages and exchange experiences. Our 55'' screen is available to enjoy the best sports events, series, and movie nights. It is a fact that you're still missing Cali if you have not spent yet a sunset with cold beers on our terrace. content.value:
We offer beautiful privates and dorms with private bathrooms and all day hot water.

Our dorms come with high quality mattresses, lamps and outlets at each bed for charging your electronics in privacy.

We also have some of the fastest WIFI of any hostel at 20Megs per second (fast for Colombia) and a router on each floor. Perfect for people looking for a base in Cali that feels like home; where you can work and play.

Guests staying at Casa Miraflores have access to the entire property, which features many cozy communal areas, leather sofas and 3 shared kitchens. A chefs paradise and a place to bring that special someone ;)

We also offer free group salsa classes Monday, Wednesday and Friday, as well as private classes with hot instructors if you want to take your skills to the next level while in Cali. (Recommended)

If you’re looking for an all day party hostel then please stay somewhere else.

But if you're looking for the evolution of your typical backpacker hostel, a place that feels like a sanctuary in the middle of the city, a place to recover after long travel or a night on the town, then Casa Miraflores is the place for you.

The hostel scene has evolved ;)

Book now and we’ll see you soon!

description.description: Casa Miraflores is a three time "Travelers Choice" winning hostel that’s pioneering the chill hostel scene with deep house vibes, and eclectic decor. content.value:
You are not a guest, you are family.

Feel at home while salsa caleña takes over you. Welcome to the family.

content.value:
Founded in 1555 by a Spanish conquistador, Buga lies in the center of the Valle de Cauca, a vast valley that reaches from the northern end of Cauca to the coffee region. Buga is conveniently located just one hour north of Cali and two hours south of Salento. The most popular attractions in town are the famous Basilica, the colonial Spanish architecture, the El Faro monument at the edge of town, and a collection of local swimming pools. Buga is also surrounded by beautiful natural parks and reserves. With our tour guide you can explore several different outdoor destinations, which include cliff diving, waterfalls, and lunch in a beautiful Spanish hacienda with a local Bugueño family. Beyond that, our staff can help you organize day trips to the San Cipriano eco-reserve or Lago Calima (well-known for its kite-surfing!).

In addition we offer the following services: Brewery tour, roof top terrace, free coffee, Wi-Fi, laundry service (8.000 COP = 2.70 USD) per load, guest kitchen, bike rental 10.000/day, outdoor tours, breakfast $7000 from 9-11 a.m. (upon request), and luggage storage. We have two private bedrooms in addition to the main dormitory and a locker is provided with every bed. The hostel offers a self-catering kitchen for guest use and an open air dining area on the roof-top terrace with views of the Basilica. The hostel always has free (and excellent) WiFi and coffee.

description.description: Buga Hostel and Holy Water Ale Cafe and Microbrewery is one of South America's ONLY pub-hostel combinations! Located in the heart of one of Colombia´s oldest towns, Buga is an interesting stop for all types of travelers, especially those looking for an experience off the beaten path. We serve fresh baked sourdough bread (some travelers have said the best in Colombia!), European-style pizza, and produce craft brews in our micro-brewery. A cold beer and delicious pizza are never far away.

You find our hostel just 2 blocks from the main plaza in the tiny town of Buenavista, a place of a very special Colombian coffee. The Panorama Café Hostel is located centrally in the town but you feel like being in the countryside as we´re situated on the hillside of the village overlooking the valley with their plantations and farms.

Panorama Café Hostel has 4 rooms. This place is great to stay if you want to live real experiences with the locals, also the town offers great variety of extreme sports such as Mountain Biking, Canyoning, or Paragliding. As our guests you will get discounts on the tours of Experiencia Cafetera. (e. g. the Wakecup Experience, one of the top 10 rated activity on Tripadvisor in this area)

description.description: Pacifico Hostel is located in a huge natural reserve on a cliff surrounded by more than 70.000 metres of virgin tropical jungle and amazing untouched beaches. Inside, youll find mangroves, waterfalls, natural pools, and by night, swim together to find fluorescent plankton inside the nearby caves.

This is the right place for our guests, in a spectacular architecturally preserved house in a very central part of Bogotá, from Maité it's easy to not only visit downtown historical city center, but also discover the Internacional Center which is within walking distance, or go up north and see the modern, fancy part of town! There is a Transmilenio stop just 1 block away from the hostel, which makes it easy to move around in the city.

Providing free WiFi, Maité offers accommodation in Bogotá, 2.2 km from El Campin Stadium. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a terrace. Guests can make use of a garden.

The hostel offers a continental or à la carte breakfast.

Corferias International Exhibition Center is 2.4 km from Maité, while El Campin Coliseum is 2.5 km from the property

We provide quality and comfort in simple, shared and matrimonial rooms, to tourists who wish to spend an extraordinary evening. Musical atmosphere, restaurant, excellent location and more, in Hostal Casa Quevedo.

content.value:
One of the best features the hotel has to offer is its location. North Bogota is with no doubt the best location to stay during your visit as it includes the nicest, most exclusive and safest locations of the city. The hotel is within walking distance of two important shopping centres: the Santa Ana Mall where you will find Carrefour, fine dining and exclusive shopping and the Santa Barbara Mall which has a great variety of fast food places. Unicentro Mall is only a few minutes further away. The International Santa Fe Clinic (which is one of the best medical centres in Bogota, Colombia for medical and cosmetic procedures) is only a few blocks away. Business travellers will be marvelled to know Charlies Place Hotel is right in the middle and within walking distance of the Bogota Teleport Business Center and the Bogota World Trade Center. Just a few blocks down, you can catch the tourist steam train that goes out to Zipaquira and the Salt Cathedral. A must do activity while visiting Bogota. Charlies Place Hotel in Bogota is also strategically located only minutes away from the most representative tourist spots in Bogota for fine dining, shopping and where you will find the best bars and clubs of the city: Usaquen, Park 93, T-Zone and Zona Rosa. The hotel is located just 20-30 minutes away from the El Dorado International airport.

Charlies Place Hotel & Spa offers spacious, comfortable and well furnished rooms, with private bathroom. Charlies Place Hotel & Spa offers all the services you would in a five star hotel including 24 hour room service, Cable TV, DVD, Safety box in the room, wireless and wired internet access among many other services.

You will find in Charlies Place Hotel & Spa all the services you would in a five star hotel including 24 hour room service, Cable TV, DVD, Safety box in the room, wireless and wired internet access among many other services. Charlies Spa offers our guests Therapeutic and Deep Tissue Massages among other services. Guests will enjoy the warm hospitality of a friendly, gracious, traditional but modern style hotel. Best place to enjoy your holidays in Bogota.

While staying at Casa Igua hostel, you can explore La Candelaria - the historical and cultural heart of the city. There you can see colonial houses with their red tile roofs and visit a variety of museums; the sector also houses cultural centers, libraries and theatres. The institutional sector of La Candelaria, located in the lower part of the area, is characterized by grouping the buildings that are the headquarters of the different organs of the national and regional government, as well as important religious buildings. You can visit all these places from Casa Igua, also take bike tours and enjoy natural surroundings in the nearby Cerro de Monserrate, Quebrada San Francisco and Cerro de Guadalupe.

Casa Igua hostel consists of 8 comfortable rooms, of which 4 are private. Casa Igua in Bogotá provides adults-only accommodation with a shared lounge and a casino. Featuring a tour desk, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

content.value:
La Candelaria is the colonial district is officially the first neighborhood of Bogotá. Colombia's capital city was founded here in 1538 by Spanish conquistador Gonzalo Jiménez de Quesada y Rivera in a spot known today as El Chorro de Quevedo. The next year, authorities re-founded the city a few blocks away at what is now known as the Plaza de Bolívar. Bogotá then grew up around the neighborhood. Because the city expanded west and north, La Candelaria retained much of its colonial atmosphere. The neighborhood is full of cobblestone streets and centuries-old houses. It is now a tourist attraction and university district, as well as the site of Colombia's government. Here you'll find most of the public buildings, both from the City and the Country's government. Historical squares, 400 year old churches, picturesque narrow streets are all to be found here, mixing with more modern developments in financial business district and you can find travel operators who offer city tours in Bogotá and La Candelaria.

Hostel Café Casu sits just a few blocks away from several Transmilenio metro stations: Museo Del Oro, Universidades and Las Aguas.
