description.description:
At HOTEL FIDENZI, we want to make sure your stay is as comfortable as possible.
With free high-speed wireless Internet connection, and relaxing green areas, the FIDENZI Hotel is one of the best hotels in Bogota

content.value:
Casa Quinta Hostel is located in the historical centre of the city of Bogotá, a few steps from the Quevedo stream and typical restaurants, bars and places of tourist interest such as Botero Museum, La Moneda Museum, Colon Theater, Museo Quinta de Bolívar, Museum of Gold, Military Museum, Plaza de Bolívar and the most visited place in the city the Cerro de Monserrate. The centrohistórico Bogota is one of the best preserved in Latin America, it has attracted artists, foreign, writers and intellectuals in general, who have filled the sector of theatres, libraries and universities, in harmony with the great cultural reputation of Colombia in the Spanish-speaking countries.

Its rooms are very comfortable, with shared bathrooms, although there is a room with private bathroom. Furniture, chairs and armchairs that characterise the style of the house that become furniture suitable for the interior.

description.description: Casa Quinta Bogota Hostel is a house is both which internally and externally identified with the old Spanish architecture. The building recalls the old mid 800 lifestyle, huge windows allow luminescence enter the structure and let you enjoy the most of the place.

content.value:
Close to Chorro de Quevedo and located at the north exit of the market place la Concordia, by kr 1 Bis and close to the multifamily Gonzalez Jimenez de Quesada. The nearest airport is El Dorado International Airport, 14 km from the property.

The rooms have private bathrooms with hot shower, ceramic floor; we have private rooms, dormitories, single, double and a family room that has a double bed and a single.


 One of our bestsellers in Bogotá!Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Hostal Yepeto offers accommodation in Bogotá, 300 m from Quevedo's Jet.
There is a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and gift shop at the property.
Luis Angel Arango Library is 600 m from Hostal Yepeto, while Vase's House is 800 m from the property. The nearest airport is El Dorado International Airport, 14 km from the property.

description.description: Hostal Yepeto is an old house, in the historical centre of Bogota is Yepeto, there are several well equipped kitchens for the guests, each private room and bedrooms has its bathroom, tv room, wifi in the house, showers with hot water, room Of reading, chapel, tourist information.

content.value:
La Candelaria is the oldest part of the city and preserves much of its colonial architecture and rich cultural heritage. We are within walking distance of the Gold Museum, the Botero Museum, the Military Museum, the Emerald Museum, the National Library, the Plaza de Bolívar (main square), the Presidential House of Nariño, the Cathedral, Congress, and the Monserrate sanctuary/viewpoint. There are dozens of restaurants and bars within a short walking distance from the hostel. Additionally, we are close to the flea market, bus stops and the pedestrian-only street.

On the ground floor there is a private room with a King Size bed (also available on request for twin accommodation), wardrobe, lamp, bed linen, towels and breakfast are all included in the rate. The shared dorm is on the second floor and it has 7 capsules, each one of its pods is equipped with lighting and power socket. Bedding, pillow, towel are provided and guests have also security lockers at their disposal. There are bathrooms with hot showers available on each floor.

Our room with private bathroom is a lot more than just that, it is actually a duplex suite with two separate areas. On the ground floor, it has its own bathroom, kitchenette (equipped with fridge and microwave oven) and dining table. The bedroom upstairs features a double bed, wardrobe and TV. Even though the suite has a private entrance facing the street, the bedroom is located at the back, away from outside noises. Providing over 30 square metres (350 sq. ft) of living space some may even consider it an apartment!

We have a fully equiped kitchen (stove, fridge, oven, microwave, blender, toaster, cookware, etc). The living room has cable TV. There is free coffee and tea available all day, WiFi and even a computer available for guest use, we also have a small library and an acoustic guitar if you like to play.

Mola Hostel is a purely Colombian project born with the spirit of promoting knowledge about the indigenous Guna people and their traditional Mola art, carefully crafted by women, that is why we offer hand-made Mola products and cultural knowledge workshops to make Mola art, In addition to provide information about the cultural agenda and different tours offered in the Historical City Center.

description.description: Our pods combine the comfort and privacy benefits of a private room with the price of a shared dorm. We are a small hostel with a family-friendly environment that cares about our guests well-being. We offer amazing value to travellers looking for a quiet, clean and safe place to stay right in the city centre.

content.value:
Hostal Chorro De Quevedo is in the center of the city of Bogota, in the neighborhood of La Candelaria, historic center, very close to trasmilenio stations, the closest to two cudras away, public transport, such as taxis and buses . That very close to places of interest such as, Monserrate, Bolivar Square, Journalists Square, museums, Quevedo Jet Square, among others.

In the hostel we offer different types of rooms, from single or double rooms with cable TV service if the client wishes. Our rooms have private bathroom service as well as WiFi, hot water and toiletries. Additional to this and without any cost, luggage storage, kitchen, dining room, a nice terrace in which you can see the eastern hills of the city.

description.description: Hostal Chorro De Quevedo is located in Bogotá, 300 meters from Plaza del Chorro de Quevedo and 600 meters from Luis Ángel Arango Library. The hostel offers free WiFi throughout the property, as well as towels, free toiletries and a dining room. kitchen, terrace, hot water and flat screen TV in some of our rooms. The reception is open 24 hours a day.

content.value:
We are a few blocks a way from one of the most famous night life spots in Bogotá, the “Zona Rosa”. Our neighborhood is full of Restaurants, Bars, Night Clubs, shopping malls and Public Parks. The nearest “Transmilenio” station, “Los Heroes”, its just 2 blocks away as well as other main avenues for you to move around the city.

Our hostel has rooms to suit every budget: our offer includes private rooms for two and up to five guests and shared dorms for four and up to eight guests. Some of our rooms have private bathrooms, TV and seating areas.

The AK House 82 is ideally located in the Zona Rosa, one of the most secure and central areas of Bogota. We have a relaxed and friendly vibe

description.description:
Our beautiful house is perfectly situated in the Retiro Neighborhood (Zona Rosa), one of the most touristic and trendy zones in Bogotá.
We have a friendly and relaxed vibe to assure a warm welcome and a cozy stay for our guest. The hostel provides ideal common areas to chill out, relax and socialize with other travelers as well as a pool table, ping pong and BBQ area.

content.value:
We encourage you to use all our facilities throughout the day. Spend some time in our spacious living room on the first floor to read a book, share with new friends or simply relax. If you prefer to be outside, we invite you to enjoy our complimentary coffee and tea in our front yard. In case you like to cook, our kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need to prepare a nice meal. Also, don’t forget to pass by the dining room every morning for a wonderful breakfast . Basic Breakfast included - toast and coffee and there is also option for an upgrade breakfast for 4.000 pesos.

We have both dormitories and private rooms where our extra thick mattresses (28 cm) will ensure you get a good night’s sleep. Every bed is equipped with outlets, lamps and lockers for your convenience. We will also make sure you are able to stay connected with our free Wi-Fi available in the entire property. Housekeeping is done daily and there is a 24-hour front desk.

Casa Central is in a strategic location both for those making short work or visa trips and for tourists seeking to explore the nation’s capital. Specifically, we are located only 350m away from Corferias International Exhibition Center, 2.2 km from El Campin Stadium, 3.2 km from the city center, 4.3 km from Bolivar square and only 10 km from the airport.

description.description: Welcome to your home in Bogota! Located in a traditional house with two floors, Casa Central has everything you need to make your time in Colombia a remarkable experience. Located in Bogotá, 1.3 km from Corferias International Exhibition Center, Casa Central has a garden. 3.8 km from El Campin Stadium, the property is also 5 km away from El Campin Coliseum. Bolivar Square is 6 km away.

content.value:
Usaquen Station Hostel is perfectly located to explore many sights. Front desk is always available to serve you, just come to us if you need any assistance. We will point you in the direction of all best places to visit or eat and drink, we will maybe come with you. Whatever you choose to do, we make sure you go home with memories that will last a lifetime

You will not only experience the pleasures of a holiday with the unique cozy and clean accommodation you will find here at Usaquen Station Hostel, but also a cool atmosphere that probably entice you to stay longer than planned. We have shared dorms as well as some private rooms available for you.

description.description: Beautiful colonial house located in the heart of Usaquen - Bogota. Long time backpackers Viviana and Juan are happy to welcome you to Usaquen Station Hostel. They found this beautiful colonial building located in Usaquen, and thought it could be the place to share travel experiences with you.

content.value:
Many of the buildings in the La Candelaria neighborhood - many of them colonial and republican styles - have been preserved and have been declared assets of historical and cultural interest. In this area of the historical center of Bogota there are about 500 institutions or artistic groups, museums and research centres, as well as theatres, libraries and universities.


Sierra Nevada Apartment: Beautiful colonial apartment located on property with internal fruit garden and hammocks. Full kitchen, living room, dining room, double bed, single bed and sofa bed with bathroom for exclusive use. The apartment is included at the Vivo hostel property, which has a bar service, craft shop, reception, kitchen, ballroom, solarium and hammock kiosk. Located in the heart of the historic center of “la candelaria”.

Purple Suite: Beautiful matrimonial bedroom in a colonial house with more than 300 years old located in the historic center of la Candelaria. Double bed with night tables, lighting, plugs with USB port, trunk and wardrobe, garden views. Shared bathroom Continental breakfast included.

Guajira Room: Cosy space created in the wattle of a colonial house located in the heart of the historic center of la Candelaria. For the defiant of gravity! It has a hammock network and a wayuu hammock that evokes the beautiful and warm Guajira in the north of Colombia. We will have the pleasure of serving you every morning with a delicious Colombian breakfast and you can enjoy our green gardens with fruit trees and hammocks.

Pink Room: Shared room with 6 single bunk beds (maximum capacity of 6 people) have lighting reading and plugs with USB port. Rate includes a delicious Colombian breakfast and at the same time you can enjoy our green gardens with fruit trees and hammocks.

Yellow Room:
Shared room with 3 single beds and 2 double bunk beds (maximum capacity of 7 people) have lighting and plugs with USB port.Rate includes a delicious Colombian breakfast and at the same time you can enjoy our gardens with fruit trees and hammocks.

Green Room:
Shared room with 6 single beds and 3 double bunk beds (maximum capacity of 12 people) have lighting, and sockets with USB port. Rate includes a delicious Colombian breakfast and at the same time you can enjoy our gardens with fruit trees and hammocks.

description.description: In the historical center of Bogotá, Vivo is the hostel where you can have your most pleasant approach to the best of Colombia: history, joy and comfort in a place that feels like the house of a close and generous family member. Vivo Hostel is the perfect experience for you who want to have a safe place to get to Bogotá; very close to nature, picturesque and full of life, its walls are shaped of the history of this bohemian city that offers a wide variety of possibilities for everything type of visitors.From our facilities to the careful seasoning of our food has been thought meticulously to make you live in our world; we want to give you a experience much more fun, exciting and fun than you can have in a hostel. Vivo reflects our way of feeling and thinking: we want you to take the best of Colombia in every detail. We have worked day and night to offer you more than a hostel: an experience to remember.

content.value:
The hostel has just remodeled and plenty of bathrooms, solid bunk beds with new mattresses and the best private rooms in town. With lots of common areas, like a living room with a chimney, big gardens with hammocks to take the afternoon sun or enjoy playing local games, a large shared kitchen and dining room a TV room with a collection of Colombian movies and video games, smoking terraces and a bar you can choose your area according to you mood of the day.

But by far the hostels best asset is the atmosphere. La Pinta is run by Colombian backpackers for international backpackers. While staying with us you will interact with local people that live in the house and that will be more than glad to show you around town, teach you about our culture, give you advice on future destinations in Colombia and make of this your best travelling experience.

description.description: La Pinta is the best centrally located hostel in Bogot with just remodeled facilities and excellent access to transportation. Located in the skirts of Zona G (Restaurant and Gourmet Zone of Bogot), 5 minutes walk from the Lourdes Church, twenty minutes from downtown (ten in taxi), fifteen minutes from Zona Rosa and twenty minutes from Usaqun, this hostel is made so that you have the best experience in Bogot.

content.value:
Casa Locombia is located in the very center of Bogotá, walking just one block you can find el Chorro de Quevedo, a traditional place full of art, handwork, muralism, people and a lot of other places like museums, churches, historical houses, beautiful views of the city and a lot of culture.

Guest rooms at the guest house come with a seating area. Every room includes a shared bathroom, and certain rooms at Hostal Casa Locombia have a patio. All units have a desk. The accommodation offers a terrace.

All rooms at the guest house are fitted with a seating area. At Casa Locombia the rooms have a wardrobe and a shared bathroom.

description.description: Original alternative hostel. One of the first in the Candelaria.Home to musicians, acrobats, artisans, travelers, painters and the Circo Cuenta Teatro association. Situated in Bogotá, a 1-minute walk from Quevedo's Jet, Hostal. Casa Locombia has rooms with free WiFi access. Guests can enjoy a selection of local dishes in the in-house restaurant. Staff at Hostal Casa Locombia are available to provide advice at the 24-hour front desk.

content.value:
Bogota Dream Hostel, is located in La Candelaria, in the historical and cultural center of Bogota, in a house that has three floors, the first floor is the reception on the second floor, you will find a coffee bar and drinks , bedrooms, a TV room and laundry service, on the third floor you find the hammock area, computer area, play area, bedrooms, smoking area, and a beautiful balcony overlooking the Candelaria.

Featuring a seating area with hammocks and sofas, Bogota Dream Hostel offers free WiFi Bolivar square and Chorro de Quevedo are 200 m away.
Providing a tranquil environment, the rooms in Bogota Dream Hostel feature either private or shared bathroom facilities.
Guests at Bogota Dream Hostel can rent bicycles to explore the area and request free city maps. A microwave and a coffee machine are available for guest use.
Bogota Dream Hostel is 100 m from the Botero museum and 500 m from the Gold museum.
Candelaria - Centro Historico is a great choice for travellers interested in museums, old town exploring and history.

description.description: Bogota Dream Hostel, it is located in the Candelaria , cultural and historical center of Bogotá, in a beautiful house of more than 100 years, all adapted to a modern environment and an urban environment; where we have spaces in which the decoration is full of originality, creativity, colors and drawings that give a special and unique touch that you can enjoy.

content.value: Our newly opened hostel is located in the neighborhood of Nicolas de Federman, one of the safest, most quiet, yet centrally located areas of Bogota, a 15 minutes taxi ride away from the airport. Our hostel offers private rooms and dormitories beds alike. Many of our dormitory beds are semi-private, with walls and curtain, giving you privacy and a good night´s sleep. Enjoy our garden and high speed WiFi which gives you strong signal all throughout the hostel and garden — not just the reception area!

Every morning, a tasty, filling and DIFFERENT breakfast is served in the garden—not just bread and jam! From familiar dishes like pancakes and omelets, to Colombian favorites like buñuelos and arepas, you will be all fueled up to start off your day exploring the city.
We are a 5-minute walk away from the El Campin Stadium, and also the TRASMILENIO rapid bus station, from where you can hop on a bus and arrive in the historical city center in 35 minutes.

DORADO HOSTEL BOGOTA in Bogotá provides a garden and rooms with free WiFi. Built in 1995, the property is within 2.9 km of T Zone and 3.3 km of Monserrate Hill. Guests can make use of a shared lounge.
The guest house offers a sun terrace. You can play table tennis and darts at DORADO HOSTEL BOGOTA.

description.description: This property is located in one of the most central neighborhoods of the city, called Nicolas de Federman. Dorado Hostel Bogotá is very close to the airport, public transport, tourist sites and the most important events centers of the capital. You can also reach these places easily and quickly by bicycle, going through the city's bike paths. Besides, it is located within 2.4 km of El Campin Stadium and 2.5 km of El Campin Coliseum.

content.value:
We are located in the La Macarena neighborhood, in the center of Bogotá, close to the Planetarium, Enrique Olaya Herrera National Park, National Museum, historic district La Candelaría, Gold Museum, among others.

We have comfortable shared rooms, with capacity for four, six and ten people in bunk beds. All rooms have closet. Casa Maka Maka is 11 km from Luis Ángel Arango Library and 12 km from Jet de Quevedo.

The Maka Maka House in Bogota has a casino and a barbecue area. Among the various facilities there is a garden and a shared lounge. Monserrate Hill is 4.1 km away. 

Continental and American breakfast options are offered daily at the accommodation. Assistance throughout the day is available at the reception. In the guest house, each room has a closet. Rooms at Casa Maka Maka have a seating area.

description.description: Casa Maka Maka is a hostel located in the heart of Bogotá, close to the historic center, museums and parks. We are an ideal home for young travelers and groups. Our intention is to make your stay in Bogota one of your best experiences.

content.value:
Chapinero is one of the most traditional localities in Bogotá. Recognised for being the locality with greater offer of sites of entertainment, leisure and events. It is home to Colombia's financial centre, numerous universities, academic centres and a wide range of formal and informal commerce. Historically and culturally it has places of interest such as The Basilica of Our Lady of Lourdes, La Porciúncula Church. In the Chapinero sector there are several theatres, cinemas and the two most elegant nightlife areas: Zona Rosa and Parque de la 93.

We have spacious rooms, with large wooden windows that give natural light, ventilation and allows the view to the outside. We have comfortable and clean beds in perfect condition, plus we have wiki service, hot water, kitchen and all the necessary requirements.

Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Hostal CQ Lourdes offers pet-friendly accommodation in Bogotá. The hostel has a sun terrace and views of the mountain, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.

Some units have a seating area where you can relax. A balcony or patio are featured in certain rooms. The rooms are equipped with a shared bathroom.

You will find a 24-hour front desk and shops at the property.

description.description: B&B CQ Lourdes is located in an old house of republican architecture with more than 100 years of antiquity, totally restored conserving its historical and cultural style, equipped and adapted to all the modern necessities.

content.value: Conveniently located 500 m from Bogota's T-Zone area, North House Hostel offers free WiFi and panoramic garden views. Guests are welcome to use the onsite common kitchen and shared lounge area.
At North House Hostel you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a tour desk. Luggage storage services can be arranged upon request.
The hostel is 1 km from Andino Shopping Centre, 2 km from El Virrey Park, 2.9 km from El Campin Coliseum and 3.2 km from El Campin Stadium. El Dorado International Airport is 16 km away.
North House Hostel has 11 rooms. We have single private rooms or dorms with shared bathroom. Barrios Unidos is a great choice for travellers interested in walking, nightlife and cold weather.

description.description: You will not regret your visit to Bogotá nor staying with North House Hostel! We offer Laundry Facilities, Free WiFi, iCable TV, Free City Maps, Board Games. We also have an outdoor terrace. North House Hostel is just 20 minutes walking from Zona rosa. We have 24 hour, endless hot water guaranteed in the showers, or you don't pay for your stay!

content.value:
Vivero by Yatsar is located in Bogotá, Fontibón la Cofradía, 5 minutes from Eldorado airport. It is a very quiet, safe and residential neighborhood, two streets from San Jose church, and restaurants, 1 km from the commercial area , 3 km from the best shopping centers, 11 km from Corferias international exhibition center, 12 km from El Campin Coliseum, 15 km from Plaza de Bolivar and the Historic area of Bogota.

In Vivero by Yatsar you will find simple private and shared rooms for a comfortable stay near the airport of Bogotá.

description.description: In Vivero by Yatsar you will find family atmosphere and nice hand made decoration. We provide 24 h reception, shared kitchen, WiFi and airport transfers.

content.value:
Hostal Bakano Backpackers is located in the historic neighborhood of La Candelaria in downtown. It is in a strategic position to know the best places in town. The historic district is the best choice!

The brand new hostel in its facilities include: a large patio, terrace, TV room, fireplace, kitchen, laundry, lockers, communal computers, WiFi, bathrooms for men and women separately fully equipped, hot showers (6), breakfast included, luggage storage.

Nice common areas, well located, clean & safe! you will enjoy!

Featuring a patio with BBQ facilities and a common seating area with a TV, Bakano Backpackers offers free Wi-Fi and breakfast in Bogotá. El Dorado international airport is 10 km away.
The rooms in Hostal Bakano Backpackers feature either private or shared bathroom facilities. Room service is available.
Guests can arrange airport shuttles for an extra fee, as well as laundry services. 24-hour front desk assistance is provided.
Hostal Bakano Backpackers is 400 m from the Gold museum and 800 m from the Bogotá cathedral.

description.description: The current concept Bakano Backpacker Hostel emerges from years of travel experience, in which there is direct contact with different hostels. Viewing valuable and innovative concepts from other hostels, inspire the idea to create a hostel different from the others. It differs in the sense that the guest feels at home, for which it is very important to the quality of facilities and service that provides hostel.

content.value:
We offer a unique location different from most hostels in the Bogota. The old British architecture, alternative Bars, and local design shops and are all around and give the neighborhood a chill rustic yet modern feel.

The Gastronomic center ‘Zona G', Award Winning coffee shops, and Bogota’s best night life in ‘Zona Rosa’ all just 5 minutes away.

We have 24hr Reception desk, Computer, Free Wifi, TV, Laundry Service, Bar and Tours, to your disposal.

We speak English so be sure to ask anything to our staff.

description.description: Relax in our common areas surrounded with plants and fresh air. Our rooms are equipped with charging outlets, reading lamps and private lockers. Fresh towels for rent, breakfast is included.

content.value:
Bababuy Hostel is inspired by the nature and art, Colombia is the first country on birds species, Bababuy is one of the 1.900 species in Colombia and it’s a word that came from the indigenous language to call that bird. Inspired on nature, birds, and our culture we decorated some areas of our hostel.

Bababuy Hostel is in Bogotá, Colombia at 2650 MASL, is located on the neighbourhood Veracruz Fontibon. The Hostel is just 3.1km far from the International Airport El Dorado, 4.0 km away from the Bus Terminal Station of Bogota and 2km from Transmilenio Station El Dorado. Close to the Hostel is easy to take any kind of transportation, we have different malls close to the area if your interest is to buy, but also for the nightlife we are just 10 minutes away from Modelia’s Bar Area, and of course if you want to get in contact with the Local Markets, we have Fontibon Local Market 5 minutes by car from the Hostel. If you are interested to go to la Candelaria, don’t worry is very easy to get there by taxi, bus or private transportation we are just 20 minutes by car far from downtown.

Our beds are made of recycled wood, we worked with recycled pallets to build the main furniture of the hostel, we use rainwater to flush some of our toilets and we use biodegradable products to clean.

description.description: Bababuy Hostel has nice accommodation and dormitories, we are open to share and if you don't mind we have shared rooms, bathrooms and kitchen, we think that to have a better world we have to build values ,and sharing is the best way to show that you are prepared to share this world with other people. We offer you a bed with blankets, pillow, bed sheets, towel, hot water and breakfast.

content.value: Candelos Hostel is a place where you can find art and culture in a space that belongs to the historical and cultural heritage, but where you will feel like.

Featuring a bar, shared lounge, garden and free WiFi, Onde Pepe Hostel Candelos Bogotá is located in Bogotá, 600 m from Quevedo's Jet and 1.1 km from Luis Angel Arango Library. Boasting a terrace, this property is set a short distance from Bolivar Square, Gold Museum and Rosario's Square. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and organising tours for guests.
At the hostel, every room is equipped with a shared bathroom with a shower.
A continental breakfast is available daily at Onde Pepe Hostel Candelos Bogotá.
The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at the accommodation.
El Campin Stadium is 6 km from Onde Pepe Hostel Candelos Bogotá, while Corferias International Exhibition Center is 7 km away.

description.description: This hostel is characterized by having a magnificent location, where you can see the view of the hills Monserrate and Guadalupe, in addition to the tallest building in Latin America, where you can enjoy the bar or the BBQ area. It is a house declared Historical and cultural heritage, dates from 1873, its rooms are very comfortable and their beds very comfortable! There is hot water, and fireplace in the star room.

content.value:
A very comfortable Hotel. In the most beautiful Colonial House in la Candelaria old town. Anandamayi can lodge 27 people.' love all, serve all' are it's aims. 

All museums, theatres and major attractions like the Quinta de Bolivar, Monserrate Sanctuary, the Botero Museum, Gold Museum, Luis Angel Arango library, colonial churches and historical monuments are within walking distance. On week-ends you can join ecological trekking groups that follow the ancient Indian roads: lots of Sun, exercise and beautiful scenery.

You can enjoy the super location of this safe and drugs-free place and yet you will be surprised at how quiet it is inside, and how friendly and homely the atmosphere is. Writers, painters and poets often stay for a long time.

description.description: Anandamayi is a very comfortable and inexpensive Hostel & Hotel in the most beautiful colonial house in la Candelaria old town. It has 3 poetic and colourful patios with hammocks and geraniums; a wonderful ancient garden with waterfalls, fish ponds and incredibly friendly hummingbirds; Nice and clean rooms and an attic from where you can see the sunrise behind Private Monserrate and hear the bells from the old churches and cathedral; and at sunset, the martial band when they change the guard at the presidential palace which is just around the corner.

content.value:
We are located in the Candelaria Area. From this quarter, you will take advantage of an incredible view of the mountains and especially of the Monserrate. Located in the middle of La Candelaria, it is perfect to enjoy the most of the historical center. You are at 2 minuts of the best restaurants (included vegetarian restaurant), theaters and bars! This unique hostel because of its large patio, bright light and its hundreds of plants that make you appreciate nature mixed with a cool ambient.

El Yarumo Hostel is a modern hostel, which offes both dorms and private bedrooms. Furthermore, we have excellent common areas where the travellers can meet and get together in order to exchange thoughts and experiences. We also have a bar service, where our guests will be able to enjoy after a long day of travelling. And of course, we have Wi-Fi.

description.description: In hostel Yarumo, you will take advantage of an incredible view of the mountains and especially of the Monserrate. Located in the middle of La Candelaria, it is perfect to enjoy the most of the historical center. In the historical center of Bogotá it is located El Yarumo Hostel. As its name indicates, it is a Hostel where people from all around the world are more than welcomed. We have an open minded mentality so that is why that we conceive this hostel not only as a place to rest, but in particular a meeting point for young travelers. So, our two main characteristics are the national diversity and the youth, that 's why we are always organising events and parties in our common facilities, to put together these two elements.

content.value:
Hostal R10 is located in the vicinity of La Candelaria, right in downtown Bogotá and close to its top sights (Plaza de Bolivar, Monserrate, Museo del Oro, Museo Botero, Carrera Séptima, Quinta Bolivar, Luis Angel Arango Library, Santa Clara Museum, San Francisco Church, Colon Theater, National Museum, Modern Art Museum, and many, many more. We believe that the best of Bogota is beyond its top sights, and is not tangible, you won’t be able to take a picture of it. It's in the experiences you live, the food you taste, the music you dance, and the stories the streets have to tell about.

The hostel has 4 shared rooms with special private bunk beds we’ve designed. Each one has its own closed space, a lamp and a plug, a new mattress and pillow and a comforter for the cold nights of Bogota. Also, each shared room has its own private bathroom. We also have 6 private rooms, 4 of them with a private bathroom and each one with a double bed, night table, closet and desk, in case you need to work while you travel. For the common areas, we have a living room with the dining tables, a TV room with a couple of sofas to chill and a huge TV to watch Netflix, YouTube or all the EPL or UCL matches, a cool terrace with hammocks to chill and watch the Capital’s sunset, and a bar on the first floor to take the previos before heading out for all the things Bogota has to offer every night.We have free breakfast! Every day a different menu, with fruits, coffee/tea and a special meal, most of the times a local one.

description.description: In R10 you will be at the epicenter of the city, where it all started with its foundation, where we decided to declare our independence, and now where most of the people prepare for the future and make the decisions that will define it. So after living here in La Candelaria for 5 years, and housing exchange students for most of that time, we have found this beautiful building which used to be one of the best hotels of the city, right in the hearth of La Candelaria. content.value:

content.value:
The house offers a convenient central location for travellers, with easy access to many amenities and attractions, including El Dorado International Airport, the historic City Center, Monserrate, Corferias (Bogota International Business and Exhibitions Center), and The Campin Football Stadium. Casa Cubil is located in a historic building overlooking a charming park in Teusaquillo, a neighbourhood with a conservation designation due to its rich architectural history. Developed in the 1930’s and 1940’s, Teusaquillo was built to house the wealthy Bogotano families of the time and has ever since been characterised by its ample green spaces and proximity to the city center. Previously comprised of haciendas, during the 1930’s the area’s development was movements City Beautiful and City Garden as well as the neo-colonial French and English inspired by the European Urbanism architectural styles of the time. The mostly Neo-Tudor Victorian red brick designs have been preserved to this day and now epitomize Bogota’s classic architecture.

We have a selection of three private rooms, two of which include en-suite bathrooms. Our master suite in the attic offers a very private setting with a unique décor. Each of our shared rooms offer our signature single and double sized Cubils or Pods, which were designed to provide a private space including a reading lamp, book shelves, charging sockets, a blackout curtain and private storage. Shared bathrooms available to our guests have also been designed to grant maximum privacy by including a shower, toilet, basin and changing area within one enclosed space.

description.description: Set in a historic home and neighbourhood, Casa Cubil is a one of a kind design hostel in Bogota where privacy, comfort and decor are paramount. Because traveling on budget does not mean that you have to forget design and comfort, we offer private and shared rooms, the latter furnished with our bespoke Cubils or Pods that provide a private sleeping space even if you choose a shared bedroom. We also offer individual bathrooms with high quality finishes.

Chapinero, Bogota is an affluent, urban Colombian neighborhood set between Calle 39, Avenida Caracas, Calle 100, and the Eastern Hills. It’s the perfect district for anyone looking to experience this city like a local. It is actually a sprawling set of neighborhoods that consist of university students, a considerably large and influential LGBTQ community, a thriving financial district, and artistic bohemian restaurants, bars, and shops. It boasts impressive modern and contemporary brick designs that blend with the general colonial aesthetic. Some of the most impressive designs demonstrate curved profiles and stepped balconies that were initially designed for lower income families, but are now home to Colombia’s elite. Chapinero, Colombia is the place to experience if you want to know what it’s like to be a Colombian in the 21st century.

Be prepared to step into the historic center and heart of Bogota. La Candelaria is a fusion of art deco, baroque, and Spanish colonial architecture steeped in mind bending, vibrant street art. Take a walk down its cobbled streets and imagine Fernando Botero or Gabriel Garcia Marquez quietly contemplating art and politics while watching street vendors and children compete for their attention. La Candelaria, Bogota is teeming with history, culture and art, all easily accessible by foot to the wandering traveler. Stay at one of the newest work/play/relax spaces: Selina is located right in the heart of the city center. At Selina, you will have access to everything the historic City has to offer: food, culture, history, politics, and the most important part of any journey — people. Bring your work with you, and stay a while!

Public TransitBus, shuttle or private car

Directions from MDE Airport (Jose Maria Cordova)-
Step 1-Call us and we will pick you up price will be available upon request.
– If you decide to take public transportation the first step is to travel to Medellin it will take nearly 40-45 minutes.
– 1st method -Airport bus to Medellin via Las Palmas (price $7,500 COP= $4 US)
– 2nd method-Collective (shared) Taxi to Medellin (price $12,000 COP= $6 US)
– 3rd method- Personal taxi to Medellin (price $60,000 COP= $30 US)

When using public transportation methods 1 and 2 from airport to Medellin you will automatically be taken to downtown Medellin (El Centro) where you will be dropped off behind Hotel Nutibara. This area may be a dangerous. Buses (via Las Palmas) and collective taxis do pass by and often stop upon request in front of San Diego Shopping Mall which is ideal because it is a lot closer to the Bus Terminal Norte (North) you will need to get to. If for some odd reason you miss the San Diego Shopping Mall and end up downtown Medellin you cab fare will be a bit more compared to San Diego Shopping Mall.
– Taxi fare from San Diego Shopping Mall to Bus Terminal Norte (price $6,000-$8,000 COP= $3-$4US)
– Taxi fare from downtown to Bus Terminal Norte (price $12,000-$14,000COP=$6-$7US)

When using method 3 you can just tell the taxi driver to take you straight to the Bus Terminal Norte (North).

Wanderlust Hostel Armenia is located to few blocks from different supermarkets; and the hostel is located in the main street of the city so you can easily take the bus or taxi to go anywhere. Our location allows easy access to the main needs of the travelers like: hospitals, pharmacy and laundry. In this street if you walk to the downtown that is close, you can find “Cielos Abiertos” this is a pedestrian street with a lot of boutiques, where you can also interact with people who lives here. The hostel is located at the north of the city. There are a few English schools, hospitals and a bowling club. You can walk everywhere, it's safe, we also have some small restaurants near by and malls. The airport is 20 minutes away and the bus station 10 minutes away, we have a pick up service, with extra charge. Also, if you want to go to Salento you can take the bus just in the corner, you do not need to go to the bus terminal again.

description.description:
WANDERLUST ARMENIA is a unique experience for locals and foreigners, each of our visitors has a great affinity to take risks, explore places, share ideas, enjoy a good coffee or just relax.

In WANDERLUST ARMENIA you can be a passionate traveler or just a passing visitor looking for a unique place with several environments to enjoy, for this reason we offer facilities designed for what you need.

content.value:
Welcome to Isla Roots Hostel, located amidst the San Bernardo Islands off Colombia’s beautiful Caribbean Coast. Our comfortable Hostel offers spacey air conditioned dorms and private rooms, as well as hammocks for those on a budget. Chill out on our private beach sipping ice cold cocktails from our Bar or tuck into one of our 3 freshly prepared meals, usually the mornings catch! There is plenty of cool communal areas to hang out, eat all together and soak up sun and spectacular surroundings, always with good tunes in the background and good vibes all round. Get to us by boat only, either from Cartagena (on the Case en el Agua’s private boat), or hop on one from Tolu or Rincon del Mar.

ACCOMMODATION SERVICE:

– Hammocks per person ...$ 80,000 COP

– Dorm bed per person ...$ 100,000 COP

– Private room for 2 people ...$ 250,000 COP

BREAKFAST is INCLUDED in the accommodation price.

RESTAURANT SERVICE:

– Lunch ...$ 30,000 COP

– Dinner ...$ 30,000 COP
– Lobster x Lb ...$ 80,000 COP
– Crab x Lb ...$50.000 COP

– Octopus x Lb ...$50.000 COP
– Ceviches ...$ 45,000 COP // 50.000 COP

NOTE: At home we do not have auxiliary KITCHEN therefore we do not provide this service.

TOURS:
– Plankton ...$ 40,000 COP
– Beaches (Múcura or Tintipan) ...$ 25,000 COP
– Reef snorkeling (Maravilla island) ...$ 30,000 COP
– Mistica Island ...$ 40.000 COP
– Islands x 3 (Islote, Múcura and Tintipan) ...$ 50,000 COP
– Islote Santa Cruz (The most crowded island in the world)...$15,000 COP

ACTIVITIES:
– Snorkel (Around the island)  $ 10,000 COP x 1h. - $ 15,000 COP x 3 hours.
– Paddle or Kayak $ 20,000 COP x 1h. - $ 50,000 COP x 3 hours.
– Subwing $50.000 COP 30 min.


BAR:
– Cocktails happy day 2x1...$ 30,000 COP
– Mixed -Gin & Cuba libre- ...$ 20,000 COP
– Aguila...$ 6,000 COP
– Club Colombia...$ 7,000 COP
– Juice...$ 7,000 COP

ProductsAccommodations, Restaurant, Bar, Tours and Rentals

NOTE: We sell nice cocktails and liquor in the hostel, so bringing your own is not allowed!.

Remember to bring enough Pesos with you, Isla Roots Hostel accepts CASH ONLY (there are no ATMs on the Islands)!
Public Transit

HOW CAN YOU GET TO THE HOSTEL ISLA ROOTS? 3 OPTIONS: From Cartagena, Rincon del Mar and Tolu. FROM Cartagena. Tranquiiteasy Boat offer direct service from Cartagena that goes every day. Boats leave at 9:00 am from "Muelle La Bodeguita" Entrance No.5, arriving around 11:00am Boats depart from Isla Roots to Cartagena everyday, departure time is 12m, arriving to "Muelle La Bodeguita" around 2:00pm $ 100,000 COP per person each way. *Please keep in mind that you MUST reserve your boat by yourself and in ADVANCE, as space is limited* IMPORTANT: For Maritime Security passengers are only allowed one bag of 10kg, as space is extremely limited. GROUND TRANSPORTATION: Communicate with Transport González or any other taxi service. They pick you up at your Hostel in Cartagena at 5 in the morning! Or you have to be at 5 in the morning at the bus terminal. Cel: 3176425106 or landline: 6530269 Price: 50,000 COP from the hostel collecting; 40,000 COP cartagena`s terminal a bus or van to San Onofre, then take a motorcycle taxi to Rincón del Mar 10,000 COP. These guys also offer taxi services Rincon: to call taxis Carlos 3207000831 to 4 persons 180,000 COP or Oscar 3114075900-6 people 220,000 COP. From Rincón del Mar rent your own boat to Isla Roots Hostel for 200,000 COP. This is up to 2-3 people. If you are with more people the boat will become 300,000 COP. Because you rent your own boat you can come any time of day, but remember that the later in the day to come over the sea will be chopped. The ferry services and taxis are not affiliated with Isla Roots Hostel and operate on their own. FROM TOLU: Another way is to go by bus or plane Tolu and there is a public boat every morning from Maradentro Boat Club to the islands of San Bernardo, Tintipan Island (45 min 50.000 pp one way.) These boats only go at 8:00 am and return at 3pm. You can communicate with Luis to +573126261376 to book boat or have general information of Tolu. Remember to have enough cash in pesos because there are no ATMs on the islands or in Rincon, and only accept cash payments.

description.description:
Welcome to Isla Roots. Backpackers Paradise. A unique island experience. San Bernardo Islands. Colombia.

Isla Roots focuses its business on the innovation of tourism services in order to always ensure that it has a wide range of possibilities for each challenge it undertakes, be it an event or any other activity, exploring the unknown crossing borders and reaching new goals in the entertainment business.

node.hostelName: El Morro Hosteria The Hill BnB

content.value:
El Morro Hosteria- The Hill BnB is a Nature-themed inn located at El Almejal beach, 1 km from the center of the town El Valle and 13 Km by car from Bahia Solano's Airport. We're strategically located right on the beach, offering confortable accommodations, cater and pamper by the owners Jupi and Monica; We're sticklers for ensuring your stay is the best it can be.

The house is divided into 3 floors, first floor will be the restaurant (in the near future) second floor divided in 3 double bedrooms each with its own private bathroom, all modern and clean. A serene combination of modern comforts with typical Pacific furnishings grace the entire house promising you a clean atmosphere.

El Morro Hosteria- The Hill BnB's Policies & Conditions:

Check in from 1:00 .
Check out before 11:00 .

Payment upon arrival by cash.
Taxes included.

Cancellation policy: 7 days before arrival.

Breakfast included.

General:

No curfew.
Reception available from 06:00 until 21:00

description.description: El Morro Hosteria- The Hill BnB, Is a family oriented B&B designed and built by Jupi Da Silva and Monica B Da Silva. A Eco tourism place where world travelers can really feel at home away from their own. With stunning views of the pacific ocean and jungles all en globed in one epic setting on Almejal beach.

content.value:
If you are looking for extensive beaches, rivers, waterfalls, whales, turtles, tranquility, sea, sun, rain, birds, frogs, remote places and great biodiversity, then this is the place to live an extraordinary adventure.

Dare to live a different and unforgettable experience in one of the most beautiful and forgotten places on the planet. The amenities will not be what you would find in an urban place but the experience will not be found anywhere else on the planet

The city is a fishing village and the people are cheerful, hospitable and focused on the parties that can be found. You can have fun at Mama Orbe Family Eco Farm, walking through the jungle, relaxing on the beach or dancing with the locals, surfing, practicing sport fishing.

There is a 24-hour front desk, dry cleaning services, room service and gift shop at the property.

You can engage in various activities, such as horse riding and snorkelling. We also offer the services of turtle watching, hiking to the National Natural Park Utría and we are the ideal link so that you can get the best price and go to see whales

description.description:
Mama Orbe Family Eco Farm offers pet-friendly accommodation in El Valle. The inn has a views of the sea, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant of the hostel.

Mama Orbe is a hostel located on the Pacific coast of Colombia. We are located at Cuevita beach, it is a remote place approximately 4 kilometers from the city center. The town is called El Valle and is part of the municipality of Bahía Solano.

content.value:
It is a zone of humid forest with beach where you have direct contact with nature, it is a very quiet place suitable to rest and disconnect from the outside world, we have many natural attractions nearby and also direct contact with native people of the region because we have a wealth local culture.

the room the private cube has natural lighting and ocean view, has private bathroom, fan, balcony, table and chairs to read. The shared room is spacious with 8 single beds with mosquito net and personal lockers, fan, balcony with hammock and sea view. It is located 15 meters from the communal bathrooms and showers.

Hakuna Matata Hostal Conditions and Policies:

Cancellation policy: 24h before arrival.

Check in from 11:00.
Check out before 17:00.

Payment upon arrival by cash.

Taxes included.
Breakfast included.

General:
Reception open 24/7.
No curfew.
The maximum period of stay is of 14 days.

description.description: Hakuna Matata Hostal is in front of the sea, behind the hostel we have a natural reserve where you can make ecological walks, we have fruit trees where you can see animals like birds, reptiles and insects, the hostel is a quiet space to read, meditate or rest, we have The Bar where you will listen to music from the region and the general dining room where you can share with the family, we are 10 minutes from the Town.

content.value:
In our hostel, we offer different rates and accommodations like private rooms with shared bathrooms, private rooms with private bathroom and shared dorms with 4 beds and 3 beds. In our kitchen, you can prepare your favorite food. Therefore, we have a refrigerator, a water filter and all the utensils you need.

We organize different types of water and land visiting tours: for example to amazing waterfalls with fresh and clear water, hot springs, indigene community, the mangrove river or, see the baby turtles. Depending on the season you can go watching humpback whales. We also have surfboards to rent and offer surfing classes. When the weather allows it, we make bonfires in front of the beach.

We are located in the heart of the village, the valley, where you can easily access shops, bakeries, restaurants with typical foods of the region, discos and local bars, both water and land transportation. We are 30min from the Bahía Solano airport and in front where the tours and the boat leave via Nuqui, we are facing the sea where 10 minutes walking to the right we can enjoy La Almejal Beach and its beautiful sunsets with a beautiful jungle vegetation With giant volcanic rocks and 10 minutes on the left we can find Cuevita Beach. You can appreciate incredible sunsets over the sea from our terrace accompanied by a delicious beer. You can also discover the native lifestyle and share with them,
Take it easy and relax in this tropical paradise!

In our hostel we offer different types of rates and accommodation, both private rooms with shared bathrooms, private rooms with private bathrooms and shared rooms. Having access to our fully equipped kitchen with fridge, water filter, and utensils to prepare your favorite meals .
We also organize different types of water tours and land walks. Visits to incredible waterfalls of fresh and crystalline waters, hot springs, releases and collections of turtles, depending on the time humpback whale sightings, visit to indigenous communities, walk through the mangrove river, classes and surfboard rentals. Depending on the weather we enjoy night bonfires facing the sea.

description.description:
We are located at the heart of the village, where you can find mini markets, bakeries, restaurants with food of the region, local bars, and clubs, as well as water and land transportation. We are located 30min away from the airport of Bahia Solano and in front of the boat stop to Nuqui. 10min walking can enjoy the beach Almejal with beautiful sunsets, amazing views with big volcanic rocks and amazing waves for swimming and surfing. 20min in the other direction you can find the Cuevita beach. Besides you can discover the lifestyle of the 5000 Afrocolombian Native people living in the village.
take it easy and relax in this tropical paradise!

content.value:
We have three shared rooms; two six bed dorms and one four bed dorm. We also have a private room, the ‘Pelican Suite’, which has its own bathroom and shower. All the rooms have a view to the jungle and the sea and small lockers to save important stuff. There are two shared bathrooms with showers in addition to an outdoor shower used by guests when returning from the beach. In The Pelican House all guests have access to a fully equipped kitchen to cook your own food. We also have a bar where you can purchase beers and spirits. We also have a library where guests are welcome to borrow books and a projector which we often use for movie nights. In our garden we have fruits, vegetables and herbs that we share with our customers.

We have excellent contacts with local tour operators who we know and trust; The tours range from whale watching (June to November), watching the turtles lay and hatch their eggs (August to January), bird watching, taking a boat trip to Utria National Park where you can tour the mangroves and do snorkeling, taking a day trip inland to visit indigenous communities, trekking to one of the many beautiful waterfalls nearby and many more.

So, finally who are we? We are an italo-colombian couple with four dogs and two cats! Come and be part of our family!

The Pelican House Conditions and Policies:

Cancellation policy: 24h before arrival.

Check in from 11:00 to 18:00.
Check out from 07:00 to 10:00.

Payment upon arrival by cash.

Taxes not included - 19.00% for residents in Colombia. Foreigners are exempt from taxis.
Breakfast not included.

General:
Reception open 7:00am to 10:30pm.
No curfew.
The maximum period of stay is of 14 days.

description.description: Our hostel is located on El Almejal beach, one of the most beautiful beaches on the Pacific Coast of Colombia in El Valle, Chocó, a small town near Bahia Solano (45 minutes in Tuk-tuk or car). We are a 25 minute walking from town which can be reached at any time and where you can buy all necessary amenities. The hostel lies right between the jungle and the stunning Pacific Ocean. You can therefore walk right onto the beach from hostel or around our garden and surrounding jungle and immerse yourself in the local flora and fauna. We have lots of areas to rest and relax where you can lie back in a hammock and enjoy the sounds (and view!) of the ocean and jungle mixing, creating a unique experience.

content.value:
The Humpback Turtle is Playa Almejal's first backpackers hostel where the jungles of Choco meet the stunning beaches of the Pacific Ocean.

With our thatch roof cabins and extensive organic garden, The Humpback offers private rooms, spacious dorm rooms, Hammocks, vibing beach bar, communal kitchen, surf board and kayak rentals, a wide range of local tours and activities, as well as our restaurant where fresh fish and home grown herbs keep it tasty.

The town is a classic fishing village, and the people are some of the most hospitable and party focused people one can come across. Whether chilling at the Humpback, trekking through the jungle, relaxing on the beach, or dancing with the locals, El Valle's got a bit for everyone.

Come and live the Pacific at the Humpback Turtle!

Please note:

Breakfast is included!

Cancellation policy: 72h advance notice
Payment upon arrival by cash only

Check in from 13.00
Check out before 11.00

description.description: The Humpback Turtle has been the place for like minded travelers on the Pacific Coast since 2011, when the first bungalow was born.  Since then, we along with the local community have put our hearts and souls into what the Humpback is today.  We offer private rooms, dorm beds, as well as a covered camp site with hammocks and lockers.  Our restaurant serves fresh fish daily, and delicious flavors come from our extensive organic garden.  We have a vibey beach bar, where you can have a cold beer or fruit juice while watching the waves crash.  Everything has been made with natural materials from the region, with palm thatch roofs, tropical hardwood floors, and cane and bamboo walls. As we are right on the beach in front of the Pacific Ocean, the sea breeze keeps nights cool and the verdant jungle the air fresh. Nestled amidst our lush gardens and between 2 streams, the Humpback is your spot from which to explore the beauty of Choco and the magic of the Pacific Coast!.

content.value:
The average year long temperature is about 22-25 degrees so we take full advantage of the outdoors with an outdoor kitchen, a jungle shower, bamboo cabanas with large open windows and a gorgeous vista point with lots of hammocks … but don't expect everything to be squeeky clean and sanitized... this is nature and expect the many cats and dogs to come up to you for some serious cuddling sessions

We have 3 bamboo huts
Private hut with a queen size bed,
Private hut with 2 twin beds
5 bed dorm
Each comes with large open air windows, vistas on the plantation and nature, mosquito nets, linens, blankets and plenty of storage space.

Bring food with you - for your convenience there is a small onsite store with pasta, rice, tuna, oil, condiments and beers for sale (3000 pesos per beer)
You can also hike to a nearby small store with eggs, cow milk or go to the village (about 45 minute hike) where you will find a bakery and other food items as well as a wifi spot
We do not offer breakfast or coffee but a lemon cleanse with organic lemons picked daily from the trees and available to you all day for juices and for your cooking

There is no wifi/internet at Mystic Banana, only relaxation and detox from civilization, togetherness, face to face conversations, reading in hammocks, playing games, guitar and other music instruments, recharge your internal batteries, reconnect with nature

This is a working cacao farm so quite regularly we process the cacao and you are more than welcome to join us on those days to see for yourself

Evening bonfires are available at an extra cost so are massages/facials/manicure-pedicure (minimum 48 hour advance notice required to schedule the masseuse)

We're also working on mini retreats with meditation, exploring the chakra system, creative exploration of our potentials, arts and crafts, family style dinner, bonfires, as well as massages/manicure-pedicure/facials/foot baths/body scrubs

Coming here requires some effort as we are located in the middle of a hill, everything single thing we have here at your disposal had to be brought down by hand, which makes things more complicated and requires more time to get anything done, and unlike other hostels where you will probably eat out or at the hostel's restaurant, you will probably cook all your meals here which means a higher energy bill for us so please keep this in mind and if you need oil, salt, pepper, sugar, toothpaste, soap ….. either bring it with you or it will be for sale – Our prices are fair and reasonable

There is no strict rule about check in and check out, just that one night payment gives you a 24 hour access
If you plan to arrive with the 6 AM jeep, spend the day, the night, stay the next day and catch a night bus then there will be an extra charge added

All proceeds go to the Mystic Banana Fundacion – The Simple Life, dedicated to living a more sustainable life, mind, body and soul while exploring and experimenting with our own creative potentials, building a physical library and thousands of pdf volumes to share, metaphysical and quantum physics documentaries, setting up a blog to share all the things we learn here

description.description: If you want to get off the gringo trail where the only tourists local farmers have ever seen are the ones coming here, where you will board a Willyz, typical old Navy jeep loaded with coffee bags, bananas, merchandise of all kind and locals who love to ask you tons of questions, if you want to have one of the best night sleep you've had in a long time and be woken up by jungle sounds, if you want to hike through spectacular coffee fields and banana plantations then Mystic Banana is for you

content.value:
Casa Hotel el Triangulo is located in the town of Armenia, Quindio just 5 minutes from the International Airport El Eden, 15 minutes from the downtown of Armenia, 20 minutes from the Coffee Park and 40 minutes from Panaca. 40 minutes from Salento and 50 minutes from Filandia.

Casa Hotel el Triangulo has a capacity of eighteen people in seven comfortable and exclusive rooms.


Casa Hotel el Triangulo's Policies & Conditions:

Check in at 15:00
Check out before 13:00 .

Payment upon arrival by cash, credit cards, debit cards. (This property may pre-authorise your card before arrival)
Taxes included.

Cancellation policy: 72 hours before arrival.

Breakfast included.

General:

No curfew.
Recepton available 24 hours

description.description: Casa Hotel el Triangulo is synonymous with comfort, privacy, tranquility, luxury, design and customer service. The Triangle is located in one of the department's strategic sites, making them easier to access and transfer to the main tourist sites of Quindio.The hotel has a total area of 8,000 meters, of which 2200 meters for the hotel and 5,800 are green areas. We offer cable TV, free WiFi, Outdoor Terrace, air conditioning, free parking, Outdoor Swimming Pool. The breakfast is included.

content.value:
WE PROVIDE FREE AIRPORT OR TERMINAL PICK UP!

Beautiful colonial house with all the amenities of modern living right on the main road from Armenia to the Airport, surrounded by the Andean Mountains and flat in the middle of the Coffee Growing Zone of Colombia.

Ample, well aired and well lit bedrooms and lots of stuff to do. Swimming pool, BBQ zone, rest and reading areas with outdoor bar, soccer field, basketball loop, volleyball net, tennis wall, billiard and rooms to accommodate just about any configuration. Deluxe room w/twin and single bed or bunk bed, vestier and private bath, Private rooms with double bed; family room with double bed and bunk bed; and rooms with two bunk beds.

Please Note:

Check in and check out is flexible. Please contact us regarding your arrival time.

We accept all credit cards.

description.description:
If what you are looking for in Armenia is a comfortable, well located, economical hotel, but above all well recommended, you found the perfect place. 5 minutes from the Airport, 2 minutes from the Country Club and 20 minutes from the center of Armenia.

We are on the road to the airport adjacent to the pedestrian entrance of the University of Gran Colombia, in addition to being 30 minutes away from most local attractions, Parque del Cafe , Los Arrieros, Recuca , JardinBotánico / Mariposario, etc.

content.value:
The hotel is located in the heart of Armenia, with an easy access to different routes. All the attractions are situated within walking distance: Bolivar Square and the Cathedral of Armenia. You will find near to the property the most famous shopping centre, supermarkets and clubs!

Come and stay in our large and comfortable rooms. The hotel features spacious rooms with private bathroom, cable TV, fan , natural light and WiFi.

Hotel Centenario Policies & Conditions:

Cancellation policy: 72h before arrival.
Payment upon arrival by cash, credit cards, debit cards. This property may pre-authorise your card before arrival.

Check in from 15:00 PM
Check out before 13:00 PM.

Taxes not included - occupancy tax 19.00 % per room per night
Taxes not included - occupancy tax 5000.00 COP per person per night
Breakfast not included - 10500 COP per person per day.

General:
24 hours reception
No curfew.

description.description: Our helpful staff will help you at any time you need because we have 24 hour reception! We also offer a good local cuisine. The hotel has 50 rooms, two meeting rooms, private parking, WiFi, restaurant, gym and sauna.

content.value: Here at Casa Quimbaya we serve both backpackers and the local community. You can taste delicious coffee and food at our restaurant and dance the night away to live music. Our hostel is in the perfect location to explore the beautiful city of Armenia and everything Quindio has to offer. We're the perfect base to get to places like Salento, Cocora Valley, Filandia or Buenavista - they're just a bus ride away. Stay with us and get to know the people and the places of Colombia's coffee region.
Friendly knowledgeable staff, bilingual in English and Spanish.
Best coffee tour in the region.
Close to activities and good transport connections.
Everything you need to continue your journey from our hostel's 24 hour reception.

Our hostel has 2 dormitories (4 and 9 beds) with bunk beds for shared accommodation and 3 private rooms with either shared or private bathroom. We also provide free safety lockers with power outlets inside.

Our services:
- Wi-Fi
- Fully equipped communal kitchen
- TV lounge with Netflix
- 24 hour reception
- Laundry (20.000 cop)
- Hot water

You can also book the amazing Caficultur Tour through us, and learn more about coffee and culture in the region with Don Leo and his wife - a must-see in the region!

Please Note:
Check in: 2:00 pm
Check out: 11:00 am
Cancellation policy: 1 day before arrival
We accept cash, debit and credit card

description.description: Welcome to Casa Quimbaya Hostel and Coffee-bar, the place to be to get to to know Armenia and explore the coffee region, “Eje Cafetero”. Places like Salento and Filandia are just a short bus ride away. Our hostel is located in a safe and lively neighborhood in the northern part of the city and steps away you’ll find restaurants, bars, and grocery stores. Better yet, come downstairs and enjoy our in-house restaurant/bar. We serve great drinks and food with fresh produce from local farmers. Live musicians perform from Wednesday to Saturday until 11pm.

content.value:
24 Suites with excellent design and decoration
– Endless Pool
– Turkish
– Sauna
– Turkish
– Heliconias Park
– Restaurant and bar
– WIFI zone
– Table games
– Children's Zone
– spa

Our Hotel Mirador las Palmas gives you a warm greeting and invites you to visit our region that is now declared a world heritage site by UNESCO, let yourself be tempted and live an unforgettable moment visiting one of the wonders of the coffee axis.

We handle Personalized Transportation Service and with the Best Rates

description.description:
Welcome Hotel Mirador Las Palmas, Winners of the Traveler's Choice 2019 Award No. 1 of Colombia and No. 18 of the world.

We are not a typical farm hotel, we are a luxury hotel on the field.

Its architecture, the design and the simplicity of its buildings contrast in a perfect way with the most beautiful view of the valley Maravelez that tinged with the green of its natural environment.

Its colorful gardens, recreation areas and comfort, give the place warmth and atmosphere to give you a pleasant stay, tranquility and pleasure of a real break!

content.value: The Black Sheep Hostel is a thirteen year old New Zealand/ Colombian run hostel located in the best area of Medellin. Less than ten minutes walk from the Metro Station Poblado, two major shopping centers, one of the largest supermarkets in the city and the top University for studying Spanish, EAFIT.
Plus we are only ten to fifteen minutes walk to the Zona Rosa with hundreds of bars and restaurants.

description.description:
The Black Sheep Hostel is a thirteen year old New Zealand/ Colombian run hostel located in the best area of Medellin. Less than ten minutes walk from the Metro Station Poblado, two major shopping centers, one of the largest supermarkets in the city and the top University for studying Spanish, EAFIT.

Plus we are only ten to fifteen minutes walk to the Zona Rosa, hundreds of bars and restaurants.

content.value:
I'm going to tell you a secret, pay attention. If you are going to start your trip, to finish it, or maybe just to be in step, you will want to feel happy, excited, expectant to meet new people, to live new experiences, to feel the world, to be free, to be a traveler. Casa Bellavista is the perfect place for your trip and even more for you, the atmosphere is incredible, in our house you can get to know Colombia, our family, as friendly and warm as our people, our mascot (Maya) a little dog who receives everyone as if he knew them for centuries. Anyway, in Casa Bellavista you will be another Colombian, that's why in our house we are all willing to help you and guide you in everything you need. Are you willing to discover it? If your answer is yes, please continue. If your answer is no, come and we will show you the opposite.

We are located in the Plaza del Chorro de Quevedo, in La Calendaria, one of the most emblematic neighborhoods of the city for its history and incredible cultural tessitura. In this place it is said that the indigenous leader of the Muiscas could observe the whole sheet at its width and length, in this place Gonzalo Jiménez de Quesada founded the city and was born the capital city of Colombia, Bogotá.

In the surroundings of La Candelaria, you will find the best Walking tours and Graffiti tours, with which you can explore the area in 2 or 3 hours exploring the most beautiful places and murals you have ever seen. In the neighborhood you will find many of the museums available in the city, where you can appreciate the history of our country in all the known eras, from the magnificent Gold Museum passing through the Vase Museum, Botero Museum, Museo Quinta Bolivar and others . You will also find the Cerro Monserrate, where you can take a two-hour walk to reach its peak or you can take the cable car if the sport is not your strong point. Outside the house you will be fascinated by the street culture, along with its artists and sporadic events. And so I could continue for many more lines, but when this takes out we can talk more calmly.

As a small sample, I tell you that we offer ecological walks to the waterfall La Chorrera, to the paramo of Sumapaz and Chingaza, exits to Guatavita and Zipaquirá. For lovers of cycling, we have the Bike Tour, a tour that lasts about 4 hours and where you can see more distant places in the city. For lovers of the night, in the city we have a place called Zona Rosa, where you can find the best clubs, bars and restaurants in the city, and that's where all the people go to celebrate, dance and enjoy.

Anyway, in Casa Bellavista you will be another Colombian, that's why in our house we are all willing to help you and guide you in everything you need. Are you willing to discover it? If your answer is yes, please continue. If your answer is no, come and we will show you the opposite.

content.value: Located in a traditional coffee-region house that has been converted into a tasteful, comfortable hostel, just one block from the central town square. It offers an ideal starting point for the trek to the Cocora Valley or a visit to a coffee farm. With a maximum of 25 guests there’s a calm, intimate feel to the hostel.

description.description: Hostel Tralala Salento is located in a traditional coffee-region house that has been converted into a tasteful, comfortable hostel, just one block from the central town square. It offers an ideal starting point for the trek to the Cocora Valley or a visit to a coffee farm.

content.value: Renacer Hostel has been operating for 15 years. Lonely Planet guides have selected it as 'Our Choice'. It also appears as a recommended listing in Footprint, Bradt, Rough, Moon, Frommer’s, Viva Travel Guide, Petit Futé, Michelin, Kolumbien Sebra Verlag, Panamericana Das Handbuch, Colombia Pocket Guide, Colombia Fácil, etc. It is also highlighted as one of the best hostels in South America for overlanders.

Over the last 7 years, it has received the Traveler's Choice and Excellence in Service awards from TripAdvisor. This has lead to high occupancy rates and steadily rising revenues.\n\n Located in the foothills of the Flora and Fauna Sanctuary of Iguaque, Renacer Hostel has a total area of 4,050 mt2.
Its colonial style buildings have been distributed to generate a natural environment where the combination of gardens and reforestation areas allow native species to thrive.

content.value: Located in the tropical valley of Medellín, where the perfect combination of urban life and green spaces is found, Cocoa Hostel offers you the ideal place to take advantage of the diversity of this city. Only three blocks from the Zona Rosa (restaurants, bars and clubs), ten minutes from the subway (metro station) and several markets, parks and coffee shops you will find this wonderful place.

description.description: Cocoa Hostel differs from the rest of the hostels by being a space with atmospheres that will make you feel like home, quiet and comfortable. Our service will make you feel like if you were family, we will help you with everything you need to make your stay in Medellin unforgettable.

content.value: Ivy is an Australian and American-owned hostel. As experienced backpackers ourselves, we strive to incorporate the characteristics that we find so important in hostels . Here you will find a chill yet sociable environment in a converted mansion with all of the creature comforts of home. Looking for an amazing included breakfast? You’ll find it here. TV room with Netflix? Yep. Bar? Yep. We’re not a party hostel, but you can find good times, forge new friendships in the bar or in one of our common areas, and then bank some solid sleep once the party is over. If you are like many of our guests, you will find yourself becoming part of the Ivy family and extending your stay with us!
The hostel is located in a clean and comfortable 9-bedroom, 7-bathroom mansion, including 3 private rooms and 6 dorms varying in size from 3 to 8 beds. Hostel features include:
– Free breakfast for all guests (eggs cooked to your style, fruit, toast and spreads, unlimited juice & coffee)
– HOT showers
– Solid 30mb wifi connection throughout the house
– Well-stocked kitchen with everything you need to whip up that award-winning souffle
– TV room with cable AND Netflix, with what is likely the most comfortable couch in Medellin (affectionately named “Harvey”). Just try to pry yourself up once you get settled in!
– Open back terrace with hammock and retractable awning for those rainy dayzzz
– Fully stocked bar, daily happy hour and home of our house drink, the Poison Ivy
– Free use of our 2 guest computers
– Laundry services
– Lockers for securing your valuables
– Free parking (including secured parking for motorcycles behind a locked gate)
– Gas grill to BBQ up a storm over a few cold ones
– Friendly and helpful staff to assist you with tours and transportation (and info on whatever else you may be looking for in Medellin or on your travels through Central & South America)
– Free mediocre quality banta / laughs at reception, and nominal charge for high quality version of the same

What “don’ts” will you not find at Ivy (that we’ve experienced elsewhere)? Blaring music/sleep deprivation until 3 am, annoying “nickle and dime” charges to print boarding passes, rude staff, list of 200 strict rules to follow (you are adults, afterall), having to make up your own bed in the dark when you arrive at midnight (we do that for you before you arrive), cramped bathroom stalls requiring pretzel-twisting yoga maneuvers to pull up your drawers, etc.

Ivy Hostel is located in a safe, leafy suburb outside of the hectic party district, but with convenient access to everything the city has to offer. This is why we can offer you a great nights sleep, while the party district is only a 5-minute cab ride and the price of a late night slice of pizza away. Ivy offers excellent access to Medellin’s metro system; only a 5-10 minute (and relatively flat) walk to the nearby Aguacatala station will propel you throughout the city to many of the tourist hot spots and local neighborhoods. We’re a 5-minute walk to 2 major grocery stores (one of which is open 24-hours) and 2 major shopping malls, and a 10-minute walk to the EAFIT University language center – the largest in the city (offering 2- and 4-week programs). Additionally, we have convenient access to the growing yet still authentically Colombian sector of Envigado either by foot, taxi, or bus. And if you happen to stay with us over the weekend, don’t forget to take advantage of a “ciclovía,” in which the south-bound lanes of the beautiful Avenida Poblado (located almost next to the hostel) are blocked off to traffic and filled with walkers, joggers, bikers, and the occasional rollerblader. This occurs on most Sundays and “puentes” (one of the numerous Colombian holidays that fall on a Monday).
